string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 1
Form : Mammal

A small and vulnerable monster that is found all throughout Maple Island and Victoria Island. There are so many of these little monsters around that there's even a saying that goes, "snail is as snail does".
Snails are easy targets for beginners. There has never been any adventurer who's ever been defeated by the Snail, so if you're the kind of adventurer that likes to challenge yourself, it might not be such a bad idea to try and actually be defeated by this Snail!
A player who's reached Lv. 1 on the 3 Snail Skill could use the Snail's shell as a throwable weapon too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 2
Form : Mammal

The Blue Snail found all throughout Maple Island and Victoria Island. It's the bigger and badder version of the regular Snail with a bigger body frame as well as stronger attack strengths, but even with all its enhancements, it is still a monster that can easily be defeated by beginners. It's hard to say, however, why the Snail turned blue while it grew bigger!
A player who's reached Lv. 2 on the 3 Snail Skill could use the Blue Snail's shell as a throwable weapon too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 15
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A Green Mushroom monster with a dull looking cap. Is a transformed version of the small poisonous mushrooms and is therefore immune to poison. These mushrooms are often spotted around construction sites or nearby dungeon entrances. These mushrooms are most likely poisonous so beware not to eat them no matter how hungry you are!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 10
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A slightly darker version of Stump, the tree stump monster. These monsters are often spotted around mountain highlands. While they are very similar to the Stump in their dried-up appearance, but these Dark Stumps have some moisture left in their bodies, still growing leaves somewhere inside their body. The Dark Stump has a lot stronger attacks and defenses as compared to Stump, so be careful not to confuse the two, especially if you're a beginner!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 12
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks.

Hardly an octopus, this mutated octopus-like monster is a strange-looking creature that barely escaped the research lab of some outer space planet after being relentlessly tested on. There's apparently some people who like to cook friend meatballs with these octopus' legs. Often found around swamps and construction sites, Octopuses have been reportedly spotted more frequently around high altitude areas which seems to support the whole alien theory of their origins.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 17
Form : Plant

A monster from an unbelievable legendary story about a lumberjack who'd left his axe in a tree stump. The tree stump apparently was reborn into this monster as a result of its unresolved past life as a tree stump with an axe stuck into it. In any case, this Axe Stump seems perfect to use as firewood. Is extremely strong, just like all the Stump family of monsters.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 19
Form : Plant

A strange tree stump that's only found around Excavation Sites. According to some archaeologists, this very unique stump may be growing its leaf with the power of the ancient aura that is constantly emanating out of the Excavation Sites. It is questionable, though, as to whether any more leaves will actually grow out of this Ghost Stump.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 2
Form : Plant

A small mushroom monster that is often found in grassy areas. It is relatively fast for a low-level monster, but beginners could easily defeat these mushrooms with a little practice.
These look a lot like the Orange Mushroom monsters but they actually have a much smaller frame and have much more mean-looking faces compared to the Orange Mushroom. It tends to disburse mushroom spores in the air, which is the single reason why there are so many mushroom monsters all throughout Maple World!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 7
Form : Mammal

A very speedy monster that attacks with its massive body. You'll need to do everything you can to get away from this guy, or else it'll come attacking you with massive strength. It is possible to catch one of these Pigs, though, and the Pig's head is apparently quite a delicacy in Maple World.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 10
Form : Mammal

There's always a sense of order, even in the world of Pigs. The most powerful of them wear a bright red ribbon which symbolizes their overpowering strength over others, and are treated as royalty. You don't believe it? Just go and try to hunt one of these Ribbon Pigs. You'll see that Ribbon Pigs are much more powerful than ordinary Pigs.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 8
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster spotted everywhere in Maple Island and Victoria Island. Tends to like to hide out in peoples' homes and eat up all their food, which will turn them into the powerful Mushmoms.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 15
Form : Spirit

Part of the Slime family of monsters, the Bubbling lives in dark, underground regions. Is normally much faster than the regular Slime and has a much higher Avoidability which makes it a much more difficult target to hunt for beginners.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 4
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that resembles a tree stump that is most often found in grassy areas and the highlands. Its short legs that used to be the tree's roots move very slowly and the tree stump can only make weak attacks, but it is also surprisingly strong which makes beginners have to spend a long time to defeat this monster.
The eye on this Stump often scares people, but the single eye will apparently shed a tear from time to time. This rare occasion serves as the origination of the people of Perion referring to valuables as the Tear of Stump.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 4
Form : Mammal

There's apparently a rumor going around that says that the Blue Snails had turned red after leveling-up from their incessant combating, but such a rumor has not been confirmed.
This monster can be spotted everywhere throughout Maple Island and Victoria Island. It has unbelievable speed and attack strengths, especially for a snail, which may make it somewhat of a challenging opponent for a beginner. A player who's reached Lv.3 on the 3 Snail Skill could use the Red Snail's shell as a throwable weapon too.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage.

A female Desert Rabbit found in deserts. Has a characteristically small pair of ears and a round body. Its staple food are clovers and carrots which grow around oases, and so these Desert Rabbits tend to be very good at finding food and water even in the deep desert. Desert Rabbits were apparently beloved pets that used to be raised by many a desert nomads.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 21
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage.

A male Desert Rabbit that lives only in the desert as its name defines. Its small ears and round body render this monster unique, not to mention its ability to find food and water in the seemingly barren desert. It feeds on clovers and carrots, and it has frequently served as a pet to the nomads in the desert.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A type of cactus plant that lives only in the desert. This youngling is still not old enough to get out of its nappy. Before you pick it up to hold this cute, waddling monster, remember that cactus needles that cover its body can inflict injury.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A cactus that lives only in the desert. As the two bumps on its head indicate, this Catus is a full-grown Jr. Catus. This monster wearing an apron is one of the forms that a fully grown Catus can take; this Catus is always preoccupied with chores and taking care of Jr. Catus; it is quite possible that you will come across a clothesline in between cacti with clean laundry hanging. This, of course, belongs to the Catus with an apron.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A cactus that lives only in the desert. As the two bumps on its head indicate, this Catus is a full-grown Jr. Catus. This is one of the forms that a fully grown Jr. Catus can take, although it frequently gets yelled at for still acting like an immature Jr. Catus.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A type of Necki that lives only in the desert. Not only could it see far with its two huge eyes, but it could also seduce the adventurers exploring at night with its jingling bell tied to the ribbon around its neck. But don't worry! This monster is not poisonous.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A type of lizard that lives only in the desert. Although it always looks weary in the hot weather, it wears a furry and raggedy earmuffs. It does not have the presence or aura of a monster, and this becomes even more evident when it scurries around the desert looking fatigued.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 27
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A type of lizard that lives only in the desert. Why this monster wears a scarf around its neck in a blazing hot desert remains a mystery, but this monster can be found aimlessly scampering around due to the thin skin on its feet that can easily incur a burn from the scorching sand if and when stationary.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 29
Form : Mammal

A type of musk cat that only lives in the desert. It has the tendency to whip out its telescope whenever it hears a noise. Although it looks nothing like a cat, it drops Cat's Eyes as if it is trying to prove that it is in the felidae family... not that its eyes actually look like those of a cat or anything.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 6
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks.

A monster made of a gelatinous substance that uses its own viscosity to jump around everywhere. The cuteness of its look makes the Slime a beloved monster amongst adventurers, which is why you'll often come across all sorts of Slime paraphernalia such as hats and earrings that are being sold. When you hunt the Slime, you'll end up with small pockets of liquid which have a very pleasant apple scent. The scented liquid can be used in cooking as well! Sometimes, it will give the pompom on its head to the adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster with a bunch of horns on its head. These mushrooms are most often spotted in dark areas such as underground dungeons or in tree dungeons. When the Green Mushroom doesn't get enough sunlight, it apparently loses its poison and starts to grow horns on its head. Remember though, that this doesn't mean that the Horny Mushrooms are without any poison. They can be just as poisonous so don't ever try to eat them!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Mammal

A type of Talpidae that lives only in the desert. It hunts for food under the sand. It has a good rapport with the Sand Dwarves, so it is frequently seen carrying a small Sand Dwarf on its head.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 29
Form : Mammal

A type of scorpion that lives only in the desert. Although it has a poisonous sting on its tail, the sting is rarely used to attack; only a very few number of people have been attacked by its sting. In that sense, Russellon, who lost an eye to the Scorpion, is a very rare case.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster with an incredible legend behind it. This Dark Axe Stump is apparently the deeply agitated form of the Axe Stump who'd had an unresolved past life as a tree stump with an axe left in it by some lumberjack. The Dark Axe Stump, just like all the other members of the Stump family of monsters, is extremely strong and is capable of extreme attacks, so all beginners should be very very careful.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 21
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A small snake-like monster that is most often found in underground swamps that are damp and wet. Tends to move extremely fast and has a high level of Avoidability as well as Accuracy, which makes it a difficult target. If you're not confident about your Accuracy of attack, stay away from Jr. Necki. It's advised that you ignore Luke, the guard's request at the dungeon entrance until you've leveled-up high enough to handle this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Mammal

The oldest snail in Maple World. It has a huge body that has developed over the years and white mustache that suits his old age. He enjoys the morning dew, so one may frequently spot him wandering around to consume the dew on green leaves every morning. If fortunate enough, one can acquire a Rainbow-colored Snail Shell which is said to grant its owner a wish.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster with a blue cap. Is the fattest looking mushroom of all the mushrooms in that family of monsters. For a mushroom, which are just about everywhere throughout Maple World, it is one of the rarer breeds. But go nearby Henesys and you'll find yourself entering into the Blue Mushroom Forest! These mushrooms will give up some gold at times, enriching the lives of many happy adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 27
Form : Reptile

A lizard monster that is spotted around the depths of dungeons in large herds. Is as evil and ill-tempered as it looks, directing all sorts of aggression toward adventurers. Go into Sleepywood and you'll see the area that's been dominated by Evil Eyes. If you find yourself accidentally fallen in the Cave of Evil Eye, just stay calm and slowly extricate yourself from the situation!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attack.

A mushroom monster that was reincarnated from previously dead mushrooms that were destroyed by adventurers by attaching a charmed amulet on its head. Who knows why anyone would do such a thing? In any case, these mushrooms have strong attacks, defenses as well as speed, but are extremely vulnerable to light.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Mammal

Pig monsters who'd started to question the class distinctions between regular Pigs and the Ribbon Pigs and decided to retreat into the highlands. These Pigs had to train themselves to adapt to the rough terrains of the highlands and have as a result turned into crazy powerful Wild Boars with incredible body strength and enormously scary teeth.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A tiny monster that appears in the form of a spider. It is rather resistant to attacks with sanctity attribute, although it is vulnerable to attacks with fire attribute. It has the tendency to weave webs anywhere and everywhere, so you must always be on the lookout when going into a building where Trixters abound.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Poison Attribute Attacks Repellent.

A tiny monster that appears in the form of a spider. It is called the Green Trixter for its green color, and has the tendency to weave webs anywhere and everywhere just like a regular Trixter; it is also similar to a regular Trixter in that while it is strong in attacks of sanctity attribute, it is weak when it comes to fire. It is stronger than a regular Trixter, however, so be cautious.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a green sea horse near the Aqua Road, in the shallow end of the sea. It looks like it's wearing a helmet, and it has become more ferocious as the force of purification of Aqua Road has weakened.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A small sea-horse-like monster that lives near Aqua Road. It lives only in clean sea water where no signs of contamination can be seen. Its tail is coiled back while it has a flashy crown-like ornament on its head, which makes it more difficult for the people to spot when it is hiding in between the corals.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A cute little monster that appears in the form of a fish with bright orange and white stripes. Although it is loved and adored for its cute image, it chases its enemy with a huge frown on its face when attacking.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 22
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A sea creature that is covered in prickly black thorns. It may be mistaken for a black stone, but when you look at it closely, the Pinboom moves in a sluggish and subtle way. Although it sticks out its sharp thorns when instigated, it usually hides its thorns and remains still.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 28
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A monster that appears in the form of a fish near the sea east of Aqua Road. It was born in the midst of huge sea bubbles, hence the name 'Bubble Fish'. Like a bubble, its body is translucent, often used as a defense mechanism to hide from its enemies.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Devil

A mysterious creature that wears a wooden mask over its head and plays pranks. Often spotted around Perion's Excavation Site. There is apparently a rumor that claims that the Wooden Mask is a monster that formed out of the Excavation Site and another rumor that says that it was a tree that was transformed into a monster as a result of the power emanating from the site. However, at this point, no one knows its origins for sure. Some scholars say that the Wooden Mask is a fairy that only lives in the highlands but not many are in support of that theory, especially considering how ugly this monster looks on the outside.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 24
Form : Devil

A mysterious creature that wears a heavy stone mask over its head and plays pranks. Has a number of surrounding theories about its origins, just like the Wooden Mask, but no one knows anything about these creatures for sure. The Rocky Mask is very curious about many things and therefore tends to grab anything that it deems interesting, which means it steals peoples' belongings pretty frequently.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 29
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks. -50% Poison Attribute Damage. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A monster that appears in the form of a fish near the sea east of Aqua Road. Its colorful body almost seems as if it is covered in flowers, which can deceive many adventurers. Contrary to its pretty and flashy appearance, it is lazy and sluggish.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 20
Form : Mammal

A monster that resembles a small bat. Doesn't like being exposed to light and is therefore usually spotted in dark and damp areas such as in underground subway tracks or in dungeons. Tends to fly at a high speed which makes it hard to attack from close by. It also has a high level of Avoidability, so it requires a certain amount of agility in order to bring it down.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage. -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A round monster that can be frequently seen in the old tower near Orbis. It was created for the purpose of guarding the tower. Its body is covered in a firm layer comprised of stone, and its ability to quickly separate its body to use a hidden apparatus to shoot laser render it a challenging monster to defeat. It is resistant to attacks of sanctity and electricity attribute but vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute, so attack this monster using magic of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

A monster that very much resembles a human with wings. Is a kind of a fairy but is a corrupt kind of fairy that became tainted when the Black Magician ruled over Maple World. The Fairy has magic capabilities and can withstand large amounts of magic attacks. Will cast magic on its opponent and attack while in Abnormal Status.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted

IA brown teddy bear manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. It is stuffed with cotton balls and has a windup spring on its back. This monster is being controlled by an unknown force that has originated from the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a prawn near the sea, east of Aqua Road. Unlike what it appears on the outside, its dignified pride will not allow itself to bend over backwards for anyone. It bounces around with its arms crossed, and it is said to have become irritable throughout the weakening of the Aqua Road purification.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dwarf that only lives in the desert. It is obsessed with jewels, and carries around a big bag to collect Lithium hidden under the sand.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Bird

A type of eagle that lives only in the desert. Perhaps due to the strong sun rays, it is slightly bald at the top of its head, somewhat resembling a baldheaded old man.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A swamp monster in the form of an alligator. Ligator is found slowly crawling around the marshes with sleepy eyes. It may be able to cast some powerful attacks but it is extremely slow, on the other hand, as well as vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Enchanted

A pink teddy bear manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. It has a cute yellow ribbon around its neck. This monster is controlled by an unknown force originating from the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Enchanted

A white toy rat that has a windup spring on its back. It scurries around the field endlessly. Although it was originally manufactured to catch other rats, it has transformed into a monster due to the effects brought on by the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Enchanted

A slime that the alchemists in Magatia created. It bounces around boasting its elasticity, as it is mainly composed of gelatin. Although some say this pink monster resembles a delicious strawberry jelly, do not consume this dangerous monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dwarf that lives only in the desert. It looks just like the Desert Dwarf, only darker. It is infamous for its ferocity, as well as its notable ability to discover jewels. It carries around the flames of desert.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Enchanted

An organism created by the alchemists in Magatia. It transports via a cylinder to attack humans. Although it appears in the form of a plant, it does not display any graceful qualities that most plants embody. This small monster could become even more threatening to humans if it grows any further.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Enchanted

An organism created by the alchemists in Magatia. This monster has become exponentially more powerful than a single Rumo. Looking at this Triple Rumor, it seems highly unlikely that the Rumo leaves are as rare and hard to find as people claim.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

The Wild Boar was training hard in the mountain plateaus when it was inspired by the heated sunlight which caused a big spark on its back. The Boars' such a fighting spirit has become a great example for all the fighters of Perion. Once in a while, though, the overly zealous Wild Boar would spark too big of a fire on its back and turn itself into a piece of roasted barbecue, offering themselves as great meals for the fighters of Perion.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster that lives in the Garden of Red in Orbis. Stay away from its inviting coat of soft white fur that is red at the tips, as it is deceivingly hot! It is still young to know how to attack with its small horn, but it has the attribute of fire which can be dangerous in the future.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster that lives in the Garden of Yellow in Orbis. Stay away from its inviting coat of soft white fur that is gold at the tips, as it is saturated with the attribute of electricity! It is still young to know how to attack with its small horn, but it has the attribute of lightning and is resistant to attacks of electricity attribute, so use attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that lives in the Garden of Green in Orbis. Stay away from its inviting coat of soft white fur that is green at the tips, as it is deceivingly cold! It is still young to know how to attack with its small horn, but it has the attribute of ice, hence resistant to attacks of said nature.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Enchanted

A panda bear manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. It has a windup spring on its back, but is controlled by an unknown force that originated from the Dimensional Schism. Once a cuddly stuffed animal, this Panda Teddy has undergone a drastic change and has become a dangerous monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 34
Form : Enchanted

A family of ducks manufactured at the toy factory in Ludibrium. These toy ducks, comprised of a mother duck and her ducklings that follow behind, are being controlled by an unknown force originating from the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 34
Form : Enchanted

A black toy rat that has a windup spring on its back. Although it was originally manufactured to catch other rats, it has transformed into a monster due to the effects brought on by the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Enchanted

A yellow toy helicopter that appears at the top of Eos Tower in Ludibrium. It uses rotor propellers to move, although it usually gets thrown around by the current of strong winds.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 34
Form : Spirit

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Tick is one of them. Capitalizing on the Dimensional Schism, Tick can be found in the deserted Ludibrium Clocktower, feeding on time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Enchanted

A spotted toy rat with a windup spring on its back. While it shares all but one letter of its name with Ratz, Retz can be found only in Helios Tower, eating away everything it can get its hands on. It has a huge appetite that has caused the Korean Folk Town a food shortage.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 36
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A Pepe that has evolved to live in water. Found in the water-filled basement of Orbis Tower, Scuba Pepe is smaller than an ordinary Pepe but illustrates higher intelligence and faster speed. A family of Scuba Pepes have expanded their habitat all the way to the entrance of Aqua Road using the hole that was created during the weakening of Aqua Road purification.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Mammal

A cute monkey monster that loves banana and toys. It apparently was influenced by the magic powers of Ellinia which would cause Lupin to inadvertently cast magic attacks once in a while. It's apparently an extremely stubborn monster that will, once agitated, throw its banana and go after an adventurer to the very end. If you have high magic defenses, then you'll be able to protect yourself from the banana that Lupin may throw at you.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Plant

According to Winston, who has devoted a good chunk of his life to studying the plateaus of Perion, Perion in ancient times was not a dry and barren land. Rather, he suggests that it was a place of which bountiful forests rivaled those of current Ellinia. The soil in Perion had been saturated with moisture and nutrients in the past, supporting the necessary conditions for huge plants like Stumpy to grow. However, it has turned into a dry land, and Stumpy, which can be considered a legacy of ancient Perion, now survives on what, little, is left of the barren land.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Plant

An ancient cactus with its actual age undetermined. Its surface looks dead and dry, but it turns into an aggressive monster when it sees a person with water although they usually end up taking more water from this plant monster. It is accompanied by desert sandstorms.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

The Evil Eye monster that lives out on land. Once in open land, unlike the dark and damp areas of the marshes and underground regions where one Evil Eye can't be separated from another, the Evil Eyes had to find a way to camouflage themselves. The Curse Eye is the camouflaged version of the Evil Eye on land.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attack. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A ghost monster that was formed from the dark shadows of the subways. It is a dead yet undead creature that wears a white cloth over its body while floating around the world. It is an Undead which makes it vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks and strong against Physical Attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the sand near the sea. Its speed and high defense rate render this monster difficult to hunt, but since it lives by the water, use magic of lightning attribute to attack its vulnerability.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

Does rank determine prowess? Ever since a group of Bloctopuses in Eos Tower have put on a toy crown, they have become even stronger and powerful, earning them the name King Bloctopus. Some adventurers suspected that the toy crowns worn by these monsters were the source of their power, but... to their surprise, the toy crowns were nothing but a silly trinket. Then where do they derive their power? They are no different than regular Bloctopuses aside from the crown... hence, the origination of their exceptional strength still remains a mystery.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A monster that appears in the form of a fish near the water east of Aqua Road. It has a few notable features including the black area around its eyes and the round body covered in scales. This big and strong creature is not dangerous as long as it remains unprovoked.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage.

A cute little pixie that floats around wearing a red hat. When attacked, this monster uses its magic wand to summon small stars. Don't let this adorable pixie fool you, as it is not shy about boasting its strong resistance to attacks with sanctity attribute and high defense rate against magic.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage.

A monster that has a unique appearance which resembles a round ball. It can cast deadly magic that weakens or temporarily disables its opponent's skills. A number of adventures have claimed that they were attacked by this monster while hunting Wild Bores, so keep that in mind and always remain alert if you're a Wild Bore hunter. Fortunately, this monster travels alone, so if you're of a certain level, you should be able to easily defeat this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Enchanted

An enchantment has turned the octopus-shape blocks that were forming Eos Tower into monsters. Due to their impressive ability to jump when chasing their enemies, they are amongst the monsters the adventurers passing by Eos Tower should avoid or approach with caution. According to Dr. Kim of Omega Sector, these monsters have similar structural composition as aliens, but take that claim with a grain of salt as he doesn't exactly have the best track record.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Enchanted

A pink toy airplane that appears near the outer walls of Eos Tower in Ludibrium. It is battery-operated though not under control. The Propelly has caused many accidents while recklessly flying around, crashing into the passersby near Eos Tower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Enchanted

A blue toy airplane that appears near the outer walls of Eos Tower in Ludibrium. It is the biggest and the heaviest of all toy airplanes. The Planey occasionally crashes into the passersby because it struggles to support its own weight.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 39
Form : Enchanted

A toy soldier popular amongst kids. It races around on its horse, creating an impact that can inflict serious damage in a collision. It was created for the purpose of entertaining kids, but it has caused more accidents and harmed people with its reckless maneuvers ever since the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 37
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

It once was a useful creature that told time, until the time stopped ticking in Ludibrium and all the wall clocks were thrown away. A force of darkness that loomed over the Dimensional Schism consumed the wall clocks, turning them into monsters controlled by the cursed windup spring. As the force still lingers, you can feel the cold air even when you're just near this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 31
Form : Bird

A monster that appears in the form of a bird wearing a helmet and a pair of goggles. It pesters the adventurers who come to visit the Eos Tower. Some say that it is a run-away pet of someone in the Omega Sector, but no one knows to whom the Chirppy actually belongs.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 39
Form : Bird

A monster that appears in the form of a bird wearing a helmet and a pair of goggles. It pesters the adventurers who come to visit the Eos Tower. The pink mother Tweeter has the tendency to foolhardily attack due to its impulsive personality, but it is not skilled in defense.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 31
Form : Enchanted

A monster spotted in the areas surrounding the Eos Tower. Relentlessly beats on the marching drum hanging around its shoulder even without a battery. This monster's battery has apparently been used up a long time ago.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 38
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

Baby seal monsters whose genders are yet to be ascertained. They are popular amongst adventurers in Aqua Road, as their sparkling eyes and tiny little flippers are as endearing as can be. They may be cute baby seals now, but they develop into Freezers and Sparkers when they mature.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Enchanted

A mechanical apparatus built by the alchemists in Magatia. It is mainly composed of steel, and serves as the foundational structure of all mechanical apparatuses that the alchemists in Alcadno build. Building an Iron Mutae is the first step for all novice alchemists.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Enchanted

A mechanical apparatus built by the alchemists in Magatia. While it is a modified Iron Mutae, it is still a simple machine to build for the novice alchemists in Alcadno.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Enchanted

A mechanical machinery that offers more functions as its mainly composed of mithril as opposed to steel. The person who has made this discovery is the president of Alcadno, Maed. Thanks to his experiments and research, many alchemists are now able to easily master the metal work process.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Reptile

A dragon monster that was banished from the dungeons. It is one of the weakest and the least intelligent of all dragons, making it closer to a monster than a dragon. But even then, it is a pretty powerful monster, no matter how weak of a dragon it may be. Is most often spotted around the mountainous highlands.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 46
Form : Reptile

A monster that appears in the form of a turtle near the sand by the sea. Contrary to the preconditioned notions about turtles, Torties are rather speedy and can orally eject poisonous liquid. They have high attack and defense rates with no particular vulnerabilities, so these monsters are challenging to hunt.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A carnivorous plant which evolved from Nependeath. It remains in one place, so travelers who can use long-distance attacks should capitalize on its stationary state. However, note that it will attack anyone within its attack range without exception. Although a plant, it is not vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute but surprisingly to attacks of sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

The reason why Dr. Kim of Omega Sector has come to question the relationship between aliens and Bloctopuses. A block golem being controlled by a tiny Bloctopus resembles somewhat of an alien quality. The Rombot is covered in armoring, hence it has high defense rate.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Fish

A gigantic clam that likes to hide. It is shy and reserved, but desires to satiate its vanity by coloring its shell with bright colors. It is not very fond of crowd, and will attack by ejecting its pearl when disturbed. A recent rumor has it that a prince picked up the said pearl which led him to a windfall gain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attack.

There are rumors about Evil Eyes that live in the depths of the dungeons of Sleepywood. In these dark marshes where not a single ray of sunlight is able to enter, Evil Eyes started losing their color turning more and more white over time. The magic aura emanating from the darkness of the abyss have also caused these Evil Eyes to transform into the more powerful Cold Eyes. Cold Eyes are spotted around with other monsters that are of the Boss Level.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

There was apparently a time when the Grand Magician Grendel had fallen down the wrong path. What could be worse than a great Magician falling for dark magic? A toy that was once cursed and got into Lupin's hands and was reincarnated as the Zombie Lupin. Grendel and the fairies of Ellinia tried everything in their power to rid Ellinia of this monster but the one mistake that was made a long time ago continues to have its effects on Ellinia. Zombie Lupin, an Undead monster that is being controlled by the cursed toy, is vulnerable to sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 48
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attack.

A ghost monster that was formed from the trenches of the dark shadows of the subways. The most advanced version of the Jr. Wraith that is dead yet undead. It wears a white cloth over its body while floating all around the world. It is an Undead which makes it vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks and strong against Physical Attacks. Unlike the Jr. Wraith, Wraith has the ability to self-recover.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Mammal

There are heroes even in the world of Pigs. Despite all the attacks being made on Pigs by humans and other animal opponents, some Pigs, such as these Iron Hogs, have survived, proving their heroic status. Its shiny iron armor symbolize the Iron Hog's undisputed heroic power. It actually doesn't have such high powered attacks, but has boss-level Physical Defenses and Magic Defenses, thanks to the iron-clad armor.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 48
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks.

A crab monster that mainly lives near the sand by the sea. It is superior to Lorang in every aspect including speed and defense rate. It is encouraged that you don't attack this monster hastily, as it dashes through the seashore at the speed which rivals that of Lupin. But since it it lives near water like Lorang and is very vulnerable to lightning as a result, try attacking this monster using magic of electricity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Plant
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.
A carnivorous plant known to feed on animals and insects. It remains in one place, so travelers who can use long-distance attacks should capitalize on its stationary state. However, note that it will attack anyone within its attack range without exception. This plant monster is vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Spirit

A cute little pixie that floats around wearing a purple hat. When attacked, this monster uses its magic wand to summon a blue moon. Unlike Star Pixie, it does not have any attributes, although it has high defense rate against magic.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a bat which lives in the abandoned mine in El Nath. It degenerated into a one-eyed monster with huge wings due to its life in the darkness, completely devoid of light. It flies around the abandoned mine, prepared to attack the adventurers at all times.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 43
Form : Mammal
Special Trait :Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

It is neither a mammal nor a plant. This strange form of life that was created inside a beaker is muggy gray, perhaps because it was created by a mixture of chemicals. It likes to roam around with a beaker over its head.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait :-50% Electricity Attribute Damage. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A group of Bloctopuses that crossed over the dimensions during the Temporal Schism were combined with mysterious blocks, transforming into Block Golems. However, the combining process was not completely successful, so one can carefully break off and acquire block fragments. The Block Golems use electricity attribute attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Enchanted

 A group of Bloctopuses that crossed over the dimensions during the Temporal Schism were combined with mysterious blocks, transforming into King Block Golems. The fully consolidated group of blocks emit a draft of threatening chilly air which foreshadows impending danger.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A toy robot manufactured in the toy factory in Ludibrium. It thrives on mysterious force generated by the Dimensional Schism, allowing it incredible battle prowess. It never ceases to move around.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 44
Form : Enchanted

A high-quality toy robot manufactured in the toy factory in Ludibrium. It thrives on mysterious force generated by the Dimensional Schism, allowing it incredible battle prowess. It never ceases to move around, but one can control all Robos if he/she can manage to take control of this Master Robo.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Tick is one of them. Capitalizing on the Dimensional Schism, Tick-Tock can be found in the deserted Ludibrium Clocktower, feeding on time. Some researchers say the Tick-Tock is the full-grown form of Tick, but a dominant opinion suggests that these monsters cannot undergo the similar process of growth as regular orgnisms, given that they are creatures of fractured and enmeshed space-time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

It once was a useful creature that told time, until the time stopped ticking in Ludibrium and all the wall clocks were thrown away. A force of darkness that loomed over the crack in time and space contiuum consumed the wall clocks, turning them into monsters controlled by the cursed windup spring. As the force still lingers, you can feel the cold air even when you're just near this monster. They are much stronger than regular Chronos.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 46
Form : Spirit

 It once was a useful creature that told time, until the time stopped ticking in Ludibrium and all the wall clocks were thrown away. A force of darkness that loomed over the crack in time and space contiuum consumed the wall clocks, turning them into monsters controlled by the cursed windup spring. As the force still lingers, you can feel the cold air even when you're just near this monster. They are the strongest of all Chronos and have the deepest-rooted hatred towards humans.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit

A group of Alien Grays that came to take over the world. They are generally weaker than other Grays, though the supernatural powers of these cunning Grays cannot be ignored.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Spirit

A group of Alien Grays that came to take over the world. They have supernatural powers that surpass those of regular Grays which allows them to fly. Hence, hunting them is not as easy although there is a rumor that their ability to fly comes from their cape. But if it's difficult to catch a flying Zeta Gray, snatching its cape would not be child's play either.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

These Grays are unique in that they did not come from another planet but were created here on earth instead. They are the product of Grays who cloned themselves in the hopes of enhancing their abilities. Possessing the main power of Grays, the Ultra Grays use their supernatural powers to attack. According to Dr. Kim of Omega Sector, who has communicated with the Ultra Grays, claims that they are rather aloof and condescending.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Spirit

An army of low-ranking soldiers that came from Mateon to take over the world. Their laser guns are not powerful enough, but their large number is threatening to the Omega Sector.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 44
Form : Spirit

An army of middle-ranking soldiers that came from Mateon to take over the world. Their mobility is enhanced, as they transport via a small but speedy UFO. They attack at a high speed, so the Omega Sector is on full alert.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 46
Form : Spirit

An army of Mateon soldiers that wear mechanic armor, which has led people to suspect that they are a special army squad. The effects of their mechanic armor have not yet been ascertained, but according to Dr. Kim's research, it is possible that their armor allows them the access to the Headquarter.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 43
Form : Mammal

A fully grown male seal monster that lives in the water west of Aqua Road. It possesses electricity attribute and has a mark on its chest that signifies electricity. One will not see a group of Sparkers traveling together, as they remain solitary to avoid reaching a dangerously high level of electricity flow. No one has discovered how the Jr. Seal becomes a Sparker.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 42
Form : Mammal
Special Trait :-50% Ice Attribute Damage. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A fully grown female seal monster that lives in the water west of Aqua Road. It possesses ice attribute and has a mark on its chest that signifies ice. It has the tendency to mount its baby seal on its head, and people have discovered that a Jr. Seal can grow into a Freezer if it receives the force of coldness in El Nath.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 44
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The skeleton of a dog that has been brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. Some have claimed that it was owned by the Sharenian army. It is the first Undead monster you will encounter in the grave site.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The mummified skeleton of a dog that has been brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. Some have claimed that it was owned by the Sharenian army. The embalmment of the Mummydog has become dirty over time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A fish monster that lives in the sea west of Aqua Road. It is frequently seen under the sea, and will scare its enemies away by puffing up. They live in clean water where no signs of contamination can be seen, but the population of Poopas is slowly decreasing, as the Aqua Road purification has weakened.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A fish monster that lives in the sea west of Aqua Road. It is frequently seen under the sea, and will scare its enemies away by puffing up. The Poison Poopas are, indeed, poisonous which makes them more dangerous than regular Poopas.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A bunny that lives in the Black Mountain located in Korean Folk Town. People believed they were milling in the moon, but they apparently have migrated for unknown reasons. They carry around a pounder with them at all times, but it isn't used to do anything practical. Rather, they come at you with the pounder when they become angry, so it is suggested that you run away from them as quickly as possible.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Mammal

A warrior boar in the highlands. The Iron Boars wear sturdy steel armor that is worn only by the chief even amongst the Iron Hogs. They come at you at a high speed and have high defense rate due to the steel armor they wear, making this monster a challenge for the adventurers to hunt.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Mammal

A type of squirrel that lives only in the Sky Forest. They are bigger and smarter compared to regular squirrels. They have the tendency to move by rolling and balancing on an acorn, and that is because they are trying to flatten the outer layer to facilitate the peeling process to get to the core. They are generally mild-tempered until provoked, so be careful when you explore the Sky Forest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 41
Form : Mammal

A type of porcupine that only lives in Sky Forest. A group of porcupines traveling the underground of Maple World settled here, exponentially expanding their population and battling against the Chipmunks over acorns.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 43
Form : Mammal

A type of porcupine that only lives in Sky Forest. The Black Porkies share the same physical features as the Red Porkies. However, they are stronger than the Red Porkies, which explains their notable contribution in the battle against the Chipmunks. Calling them a family of warrior porcupines would not be an overstatement.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Reptile

A type of Necki that lives only in Sky Forest. It is as big as a regular Necki, but has vibrant colors and no poison. It wears a swim cap that is covered in flowers, but no one knows why the Blue Flower Serpent wears it in the forest. Neckis cannot swim in water, but it is yet to be discovered whether these swim-cap-wearing Blue Flower Serpents are an exception.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 45
Form : Reptile

A type of Necki that lives only in Sky Forest. It is as big as a regular Necki, but has vibrant colors and no poison. The Red Flower Serpents like to travel with the Blue Flower Serpents. The flowers on their head is known to have miraculous substance that can cure arthritis and MP shortages. The flowers are also used as medicinal herbs.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Enchanted

A jar that was once used to store medicinal herbs. This jar has been brought to life when an unknown monster entered inside, but no one has been able to identify the monster nor the effect it had on the jar. Captain Hwang of Herb Town has been dedicating a lot of time and energy to defeat this monster, but he has not been successful. The Jar can be found in the field near Herb Town.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 48
Form : Enchanted

A jar storing an aged ginseng. It was originally created to decoct the aged ginseng, but the ginseng which thoroughly enjoyed the hot bath talked the innocent jar into escaping the Herb Town, during which the jar somehow was consumed by a mysterious force that turned it into a monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A creature that lives only in the desert. It is composed of sand, and has a hobby of deceiving people to believe that it is an oasis, then scaring them. Although not frequent, some have said that the Desert Giants do sometimes transform into an oasis; hence, you shouldn't defeat them in a rash manner.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 49
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

The highest ranking Gray. The Chief Gray oversees all Grays but can rarely be seen, as it usually hides amongst groups of Grays. The Chief Gray is wise and powerful, and it exercises various supernatural powers. It occasionally summons Grays when necessary.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 42
Form : Mammal.

The ancient snails that live in Ellin Forest. They are much bigger than the regular snails and have sharp teeth. They have a tendency to remain stationary in one place for a long time, passively waiting for a prey.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 46
Form : Plant

The mysterious tree monsters that can only be found in Ellin Forest. They are somewhat similar to Stumps in that they, too, resemble a tree stump; however, they are not dead, dry trees, but rather tree monster that are very much alive and can grow flowers and berries. Although they sometimes attack small animals, they generally feed on nutrients they absorb using their root.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Immortal

An odd monster which originated from the shadow of an unknown figure. It is a superior Undead to Wraith, and hence has superior powers. Although it despises humans, it remains in the subway underneath the towns where humans abound. Perhaps this monster is a part of someone's lost shadow. It can't stand light, which explains why it disappears as soon as a small street lamp is lit.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 59
Form : Enchanted

A gigantic dummy that an old master in Mu Lung made to teach a lesson to his lazy apprentices. Its stern face resembles that of a swordsmith and, funnily enough, possesses the powerful magic of a swordsmith as well. It scolds the lazy apprentices with its voice of thunder , so if you wish to avoid getting yelled at, you must keep a training journal to record your progress.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Mammal

A small yeti often spotted in the snowfield of Ossyria near El Nath. Is made to live in cold climates and can therefore withstand strong Ice Attribute Attacks while being vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Its small frame and slow movement makes it an easy target, but beware, as many a travellers have been badly injured by this cute little creature. The Jr. Yeti is capable of transforming into a giant yeti as well so watch out!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 51
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A ball of fire that can be found in the Lava Dungeon in El Nath. No one knows for what purpose it was created, but it attacks by self-exploding when in danger. Some adventurers speculate that the Firebomb is the follower of Zakum. It is highly resistant to attacks of fire attribute but vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A cub found in the mountainside of the Black Mountain. It skips around cheerfully, but it is still a tiger, which means it can turn fierce and predatory and catch you off guard. Occasionally, you can earn a paw-print stamp when you hunt the Hodoris.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A Three-Tailed Fox that can be found near the Korean Folk Town. It is striving to become a Nine-Tailed Fox, but only has three tails as it is still in the process of training. It has taken over an entire valley of the Black Mountain, practicing magic by casting a curse on the passersby; hence, the adventurers exploring the Fox Ridge should always remain alert and cautious.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A tiger found near the Korean Folk Town. This seems to be what a full-grown Hodori would become. Unlike the threatening firm-build it sports, it is rather cautious when approaching the adventurers. It used to be intrepid until Ludibrium was turned upside down due to the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Enchanted

A form of Mithril enhanced by mixing other metals to rival the powerful strength of Orihalcon, rendering it more powerful than regular Mithril Mutae..

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 54
Form : Enchanted

A robot built by alchemists in Magatia. It is small but has the power that will exceed your expectation, and also has an extremely intricate internal structure.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Enchanted

A robot built by alchemists in Magatia. It is small but has the power that will exceed your expectation, and also has an extremely intricate internal structure.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 52
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

A cute little pixie that floats around wearing a black hat. When attacked, this monster, which evolved from Lunar Pixie, uses its magic wand to summon a blazing sun. Unlike the Star Pixie and the Lunar Pixie, the Luster Pixie has no weaknesses you can attack, and is highly resistant to attacks with fire, cold air, electricity, and sanctity attributes. It is, however, relatively vulnerable to physical attacks, so use powerful weapons to defeat this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A form that a full grown Jr. Cellion takes. It can be found in the Garden of Red in Orbis, and this mature Cellion charges all of its fire attribute, using the horn on its head to attack. It has fire attribute that allows this monster to be highly resistant to attacks of fire attribute. Let's try defeating the Cellion using attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A form that a full grown Jr. Lioner takes. It can be found in the Garden of Yellow in Orbis, and this mature Lioner charges all of its lightning attribute, using the horn on its head to attack. This monster is highly resistant to attacks of lightning attribute. Let's try defeating the Lioner using attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A form that a full grown Jr. Grupin takes. It can be found in the Garden of Green in Orbis, and this mature Grupin, which changes from purple to green, charges all of its cold air attribute, using its horn on its head to attack. This monster is highly resistant to attacks of cold air attribute. Let's try defeating the Grupin monster using attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 54
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Sanctity Attribute Attacks Repellent.

A powerful weapon secretly built by the Mateon aliens to attack the earth. It has been built to support the small and weak Mateons, and it is equipped with multiple explosive missiles. The Omega Sector has sent over a special troop to battle against MT-09.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Mammal

A type of bear that lives near Mu Lung. Although it's only a bear, it has a heartfelt desire to become a virtuous master, hence devoting much of its energy in training. While it diligently trains in its practice uniform, it sometimes fails to suppress its animalistic instinct and attacks the passersby.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 53
Form : Plant

A plant that closely resembles a ginseng, although its medicinal effects fall way below. A group of Bellflower Roots keep intruding the ginseng field and absorbing all of the nutrients in the soil, which upsets Mr. Ku of the Herb Town. The Bellflower Roots discovered Mr. Ku's ginseng field when they were looking for a new habitat since the abduction of their prince, Wu Yang. Seeing how they've gotten pretty comfortable in the field, it is suspected and assumed that the Bellflower Roots will continue to be a pain in Mr. Ku's neck for a while longer.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 54
Form : Plant

A plant that closely resembles a ginseng. Although Bellflower Roots have been said to fall way below in medicinal effects compared to ginseng, this Sr. Bellflower Root can be even more effective than ginseng at times. It may look weak and weary, making you feel guilty about hunting this monster, but take advantage of its use as medicinal herb. After all, it's only a Bellflower Root.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Enchanted

A straw dummy that a swordsmith in Mu Lung made for those training to become legendary wizards. The trainees should never be found apart from this dummy if they sincerely desire to become legendary wizards, as most of their time must be spent training with it. This dummy has become a comical figure due to the childish doodling on its face for which the trainees are responsible.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Enchanted

A wooden dummy that a swordsmith in Mu Lung made for those training to become virtuous masters. The trainees should never be found apart from this dummy if they sincerely desire to become legendary wizards, as most of their time must be spent training with it. This dummy has become a comical figure due to the childish doodling on its face for which the trainees are responsible.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A deer that feeds on peaches at the Peach Farm. Due to the effects of its diet, the Reindeer boasts high intelligence which allows it the luxury to use powerful magic. There is a rumor that a Reindeer's antler in perfect condition without any breakage can enhance one's ascetical powers, but it is extremely difficult to acquire an antler from a Reindeer without breaking it off.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Spirit

A precious documentation that reveals the principles of nature and universe written by an ascetic of the olden times. The Book Ghost was brought to life by a mysterious force originating from the profound truth and the ascetic's magic embodied in the book. Some say that becoming an adept in this book can grant one power and strength, but the Book Ghost will attack anyone who is not qualified to be its mater.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Reptile

An extremely scary dragon that hunts down adventurers. One of its shortcomings, though, is its low-level IQ which makes it not quite worthy of being called a dragon per se. Despite its slightly thickheaded appearance, though, its cohorts tend to go around in herds which makes being surrounded by a group of them a highly risky situation. Your run-of-the-mill adventurer will find oneself putting up his or her own tombstone if not extremely careful!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Enchanted

A stone monster that's been enchanted by a forest spirit. It is the protector of the forest from which it was born, and will never launch an attack at an adventurer without provocation. But if you've indiscriminately entered into the forest without permission, you may be at the mercy of the Stone Golem's punch so be careful.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A Stone Golem monster which had been infected with an evil aura that had permeated throughout the depths of the forest, leaving the forest in ruins and annihilating the Stone Golems that were guarding the Stone Golem's Temple. The Dark Stone Golems who had inadvertently caused a detrimental effect on the Temple decided to finish their duties by going into Sleepywood. But it is said that some Dark Stone Golems frequently appear in the Golems' Temple.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 52
Form : Reptile

A crocodile monster that lives in swampy regions. Although it's smaller than the Ligator, the Croco has higher attack rate and speed. It is popular amongst the hunters who are after its sturdy and prized hide.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf near El Nath. It is a popular target amongst the hunters who are after its thick coat, which facilitates the Hector's survival in the cold weather of El Nath. When attacked, Hectors attack using magic of multiplicity, so it is highly encouraged that you quickly step back when you find yourself in a dangerous encounter with this monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A yeti often spotted in the canyons far away from El Nath. They say that the Dark Jr. Yeti is the evil form of the good Jr. Yeti. It is much faster than the Jr. Yeti and is more advanced in terms of attack powers, defense strength, etc.. It is also made of completely different attributes which makes it particularly vulnerable to forces of Sanctity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 57
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Undead monsters that can be found in the Forest of Dead Trees in El Nath. When Riche's tomb formed the Forest of Dead Trees, the trees in the forest bewitched lifeless beings, turning them into zombies. Because the Coolie Zombies became zombies to protect the forest against their will, they possess nothing but hostility and hatred towards humans. These monsters, who walk with a severe limp, are the followers of Riche and are extremely dangerous as they orally emit potent poison.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 57
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Undead monsters that can be found in the Forest of Dead Trees in El Nath. When Riche's tomb formed the Forest of Dead Trees, the trees in the forest bewitched lifeless beings, turning them into zombies. Whether it was due to an accident in the mine or simply a mutation, but the Miner Zombies have a severe limp and a nearly blind eye on one side.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 58
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf near El Nath. It is a popular target amongst the hunters who are after its thick coat, which facilitates the White Fang's survival in the cold weather of El Nath. However, its white fur blends in with the surroundings, making this monster more difficult for the hunters to spot than a Hector, not to mention its high attack rate and resistance to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 59
Form : Enchanted

The remaining fragments of Stone Golems and Dark Stone Golems have formed this mutation, which possesses the characteristics of both golems; hence, it has even higher attack rate than regular golems. It can be found in dungeons as well as the deserted Golem's Temple, guarding the temple even after its rebirth.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 57
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The skeleton of a soldier that was brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. It once was a Sharenian guard, but died during the fall of the Sharenian empire and was revived without a soul.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 23
Form : Enchanted

A round mechanical apparatus that is frequently seen in the tower near Orbis. It floats in the air and uses melee attacks. Some have said the Jr. Sentinels were built for the purpose of guarding the tower, but it has not been confirmed.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A round mechanical apparatus that is frequently seen in the tower near Orbis. Some have said the Ice Sentinels were built for the purpose of guarding the tower, but it has not been confirmed. It has a firm outer layer comprised of stone, and has the ability to quickly separate to shoot laser when attacked. It is highly resistant to attacks of ice attribute yet vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A round mechanical apparatus that is frequently seen in the tower near Orbis. It has a firm outer layer comprised of stone, and has the ability to quickly separate to shoot laser when attacked. It is highly resistant to attacks of fire attribute yet vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Fish

A A beautiful blue-shelled crab that has migrated to Florina Beach from the Tropics. It usually hides inside its shell until someone awakens it by tapping its shell. When attacked by its pincers that usually remain hidden inside the shell, one will become temporarily immobile.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Immortal

Lupin has endowed this monster with an evil spirit using its magic powers; hence, Faust surpasses Lupin in strength and size. It has also consumed the seed of magic of darkness that Grendel the Really Old once accidentally dropped, and strives to maintain the darkness of Ellinia Forest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 59
Form : Enchanted

The ghost of the past that originated from the deserted land in Ludibrium. It was brought back to life due to the Dimensional Schism, and has been a follower of Papulatus ever since, pestering anyone that attempts to go near the lowest level of the Clocktower. It appears in the form of an owl clock, and it tries to cling onto the past by turning back the time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
레벨 : Lv.50
형태 : 곤충형

전해져 오는 이야기로는 백초마을 다리 밑에 살던 지네가 백초마을에서 강으로 흘러드는 약초물을 마시고 성장하여 대왕지네가 되었다는 이야기가 있다. 사람들이 추측하는 나이는 약 100살 정도지만 확인된 바는 없다. 어떤 사람들은 바다 건너 이국의 땅에서 또 다른 대왕지네를 만난 적이 있다고도 하는데... 주로 물 밑 동굴에서 살지만, 가끔씩 약초를 먹기 위해 마을 근처의 약초밭을 습격하는 일이 잦기 때문에 주의가 필요하다.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 59
Form : Plant

The mushrooms that live in Ellin Forest. They are much bigger and bulkier than the common orange or blue mushrooms. They pose more danger than the regular mushrooms, as they are vicious herbivores.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 51
Form : Insect

The strange bugs that live in Ellin Forest and feed on moss found on rocks. Due to their diet, the Stone Bugs are covered in moss.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 57
Form : Mammal

Vicious boars that live in Ellin Forest. Boasting notably thick coat of fur and tough hide, these monsters do not easily incur damage even when attacked with a spear. It is suspected that they will one day become like the Wild Boars.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 32
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that was created by the snow and dust in El Nath, usually found in the tower and the field of El Nath. It is a white fur ball, light as a feather that can drift with the current of the wind.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 33
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A monster that was created by the snow and dust in El Nath, blackened due to dirt and ashes in the tower. It is as light as a feather that can drift with the current of the wind.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 55
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Monsters that have turned evil due to the magic of darkness they have inherited from the demons. They are experimenting the forbidden magic, and can be seen riding their flying brooms around the deep forest to gather materials for their experiment. They are vulnerable to attacks of sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 35
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A small penguin that appears in and near El Nath where the temperature is low. When you encounter Jr. Pepes, you can safely assume that you are almost in El Nath. They are highly adaptable to different conditions, although an appropriate temperature is a must for them. The Jr. Pepes, who have already adjusted to the snowfield of El Nath, move at a high speed even on ice so it is difficult to avoid them.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Immortal

There once lived a revered priest who had incredible powers. However, as he got older, he became more and more frightened at the thought of death, which led him to betray his faith and join the demons instead. Death was inevitable even for this powerful figure, however, for the fallen priest had infuriated the god whom he had once worshipped. After his death, his loyal followers buried him in the Forest of Dead Trees... and not too long after the burial, the forest somehow turned into a lair of zombies rising from the dead. Since then, many heroic adventurers have gathered in the forest to defeat the zombies. As heroic adventurers slowly began to overthrow the land of the zombies little by little, putting them at a disadvantage, the fallen priest was revived as the guardian of the zombies. ‘Riche' now protects the zombies as the ruler of the Forest of Dead Trees. Although Riche is an Undead monster, he was once an admired priest, hence he is highly resistant to attacks of sanctity attribute, not to mention his powerful magic and elimination skill. To defeat this challenging opponent, you must use strategic approach other than strength.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 64
Form : Spirit

A mysterious witch of the snow mountain. According to the hunters in El Nath, the Snow Witch is the keeper of the El Nath Mountain, and one must seek her permission to hunt there. The hunters fear the Snow Witch more than they fear Yeti. Scadur, the expert hunter of El Nath, claims the wicked Snow Witch appears in the form of a gorgeous woman... 
And it is said that you must give some drop items you've acquired from hunting as offerings if and when you encounter the witch near the El Nath Mountain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 62
Form : Devil

The spirit of a scholar who had an unfortunate encounter with the Three-Tailed Fox 30 years ago, on his way to take the service exam to become a government official. The spirit, who still harbors residual grudge for not having been able to fulfill his dreams, lingers around the Fox Ridge to solicit the help of passersby. It is said that offering the tail of the Three-Tailed Fox to the stone tower, somewhere in the Fox Ridge, would relieve the grudge of this spirit.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Plant

A strange deviation of Rumo which was created by the alchemists of Zenumist. The experimental solution melted all of its original leaves and the remaining liquid became its own organism. When these organisms began to travel in twos, getting into all kinds of trouble, the Zenumists secretly stored the products of their failed experiment inside the Alcadno Lab. Troubled by Rurumo's destruction in the lab, the alchemists of Alcadno invented a potent poison that only harms Rumo. When you spot a Rurumo, use the sprays installed in several places around the lab to weaken the Rumo.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Enchanted
