It is neither a mammal nor a plant. This strange form of life that was created inside a beaker is muggy gray, perhaps because it was created by a mixture of chemicals. It likes to roam around with a beaker over its head.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Immortal

Old alchemist bachelors in Magatia who devote their entire life to research without setting any personal time aside become this monster after life. They are irritable, and have the tendency to angrily throw beakers at anyone they see.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dragon that lives in mountainous desert highlands. Is from a very weak and unintelligent breed of dragons as compared to regular dragons of that family of monsters. The Red Drake used to have its nest set in Sleepywood, but was banished by the other dragons due to its weaknesses. It has since been training in the desert highlands, adjusting to the heat of the sun and practicing launching powerful fireballs into a far distance. There aren't very many adventurers who'll be able to hunt this thick-coated, fireball-throwing dragon known as Red Drake.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Plant

A gigantic mushroom. This monster is the mother figure to all mushrooms, and it has been said that a huge number of mushrooms in Victoria Island spored from the Mushmom. Although this is a dangerous monster that can shake the ground with a simple jump, some researchers claim that the Mushmom must be preserved as it plays a major role in the ecosystem. Mushmom has been found in a hidden area near Henesys with small mushrooms.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that is occasionally found in the snowfield far from El Nath. It wears a golden crown, and can move with finesse even on ice as it has quickly adapted the surroundings of icy snowfield. Now, it can move faster in snowfield than any other monsters, so you should always be on the lookout should this monster begin to attack. Its dashing speed and subsequent attack render Pepe a difficult monster to avoid. Only found in snowfields, Pepes have a very close relationship with the Yetis, which explains why Yetis are occasionally found with a Pepe mounted on their heads, although no one has discovered how this phenomenon was started.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 61
Form : Devil

A young spirit of a time stopper who used to work at the Clocktower in Ludibrium in the past. It was mild-tempered before the force of time consumed its spirit. Since then, contrary to what its jester's hat may deceivingly illustrate, it has become hostile and attacks people using the force of entangled time while floating around deep inside the Clocktower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Devil

A blue goblin fire that appears in the Black Mountain. It floats in the air and scares the passersby. When the goblin fire is attacked, the Morphed Blin reveals its true self, which resembles a block of brick. Rather than a type of goblin, it might be more accurate to say this monster is close to an evil spirit that lives in the Black Mountain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A type of bear that lives near Mu Lung. Although it is just a bear, it sincerely desires to become a virtuous master; hence, it is always wearing its training uniform, completely immersed in training. It has features similar to those of humans, but no one knows whether that is because it is close to becoming a virtuous master or because that's just one of this monster's special traits.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 64
Form : Reptile

A monster alligator that lives in the swampy regions near the Herb Town. It enjoys the company of small animals, so it is often seen carrying a little bird on its head and a baby Bellflower Root on its back. It does not attack unless provoked, but it turns into a ferocious monster when attacked.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 62
Form : Mammal

A monkey that feeds on peaches at the Peach Farm. The Peach Monkeys have pink coat of fur due to the effects of their diet, but these monkeys rival, if not surpass, the intelligence level of humans. At first, the Peach Monkeys helped spread the seeds to expand the Peach Farm, but because of the gradual growth of their population, they have actually begun to harm the farm.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Devil

An unknown figure that serves Lord Pirate. It has accompanied Lord Pirate in his adventures in the sea, pillaging the people, but now it spends most of its energy pestering the Bellflower Roots under the command of Lord Pirate.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 66
Form : Mammal

A cat that somehow got its hands on the book of Toist magic, which now self-proclaims that it is a Sage Cat after having mastered the skills on the book. Because it did not go through the proper, extensive training of becoming a virtuous master, it is rather antagonistic and violent by nature. You must be careful of this catty monster which has the tendency to scratch its enemy, as it has gained an expertise on powerful magic attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Reptile

A gigantic crocodile that hides in the swamp in Kerning City. Some say that it suddenly grew in size due to a strange substance in the waste water it consumed, although such claim has not been confirmed. While naturally docile, its simple-minded personality sometimes causes Mr. Alli to rashly become a ferocious monster when provoked.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Spirit

A type of humanoid built with the newest technology of the Barnards, who are conspiring to take over the Omega Sector. Equipped with only the best qualities of a robot and a Barnard, Zeno supplements the battle prowess the Barnards lack; however, its intelligence level is sub par due to a malfunction which occurred during the testing process.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 62
Form : Reptile

A monster with lots of contending rumors such as the one that claims that the Wild Kargo was once the pet cat of the ancient devil Balrog and the rumor that it was a cat that was left behind by some adventurer while exploring a dungeon. The only that has been confirmed was by one very courageous scholar who went around to get to the truth of this supposed cat and discovered that the Wild Kargo is in fact a reptile, not a cat. Its eyes, however, look so much like a cat's that everyone agrees that more research is required to get to the truth of this monster. It is one of the most powerful monsters that one will meet in Sleepywood.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 64
Form : Mammal

A penguin monster often spotted in the canyons far away from El Nath. Dark Pepe is a transformed form of Pepe, that's been endowed with evil powers. Is an advanced monster with powerful attacks and defenses, especially compared to its original form as Pepe. One thing that hasn't been changed is the characteristically fast speed of Pepe. Dark Pepe is vulnerable to forces of Sanctity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 66
Form : Devil

A young spirit of a time stopper who used to work at the Clocktower in Ludibrium in the past. It was mild-tempered before the force of time consumed its spirit. Since then, contrary to what its jester's hat may deceivingly illustrate, it has become hostile and attacks people using the force of entangled time while floating around deep inside the Clocktower. Lazy Buffy is the fiercest of them all, never ceasing to attack the adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as the Soul Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A black monster that lives in the Stairway to the Sky in Orbis. Although it resembles the physical characteristics of Cellion, Lioner, and Grupin, the Jr. Lucida has a small horn and a pair of wings, not to mention its dark and brutal force that is reflected in its black coat of fur. When fully grown, Jr. Lucida becomes Lucida.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 67
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Ice Attribute Attacks Repellent. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as its source of hatred and subsequent attack. It harbored deepest grievance and resentment than any other teddy bears, hence it was endowed with the most powerful force of damnation.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 64
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Ice Attribute Attacks Repellent. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A monster dragon that lives deep in the dungeon. When compared to regular family of dragons, the Ice Drake is weaker and has a lower level of intelligence. However, it has acquired an ice attribute while adapting to the coldness of the dungeon, and you can become a block of ice when attacked by this monster. Even its bones are comprised of ice, therefore its attack of ice attribute could inflict a significant damage.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Reptile

A dragon monster that lives in the depths of dungeons. Is from a very weak and unintelligent breed of dragons as compared to regular dragons of that family of monsters. The Dark Drake was endowed with an evil force in the cursed Temple and has grown a rather thick skin on its body. Its speed in the dark is uncontested.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 63
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The skeleton of a Sharenian officer devoid of spirit. After the fall of the Sharenian empire, Ergoth has revived the Skelton with the force of darkness.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A gigantic snowman that appears in the snowfield far from El Nath. Although its speed of movement may seem sluggish, the power it illustrates when forcefully striking its two fists on the ground can inflict significant damage. Due to its thick coat of fur, it manages well in the cold but can't stand heat. This fundamentally mild-natured monster roams around with its close friend Pepe mounted on its back. It is a pet in popular demand, as it is loyal and obedient when raised by a human from a young age.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 65
Form : Immortal

A mother figure to all Zombie Mushrooms. The Zombie Mushmom harbors a powerful force of darkness; the charm it possesses, which turned the Mushmom into an even more powerful monster, is believed to be the source of its power. It is occasionally found deep inside the Ant Tunnel, shaking the premise by jumping up and throwing its heavy body down to the ground, scaring the adventurers in the underground dungeon.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 74
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

The monsters who worked the operation room of the Clocktower in Ludibrium. Due to the Dimensional Schism, the souls of these workers were consumed by the force of darkness, turning them into buffoons of time. They attack the lost adventurers with the huge wall clock, which was used to keep time at the Clocktower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 68
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A gigantic snowman that appears in the snowfield far from El Nath. This mutant Yeti that has been consumed by an evil force is faster, stronger, and superior to the mild-natured Yeti in every aspect; it has also maintained Yeti's signature fists that can inflict major damage, making this monster all the more dangerous. Try attacking this monster using sanctity attribute magic, as its attributes have completely changed and is now vulnerable to the force of sanctity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 77
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks. -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

The monsters who worked the operation room of the Clocktower in Ludibrium. Due to the Dimensional Schism, the souls of these workers were consumed by the force of darkness, turning them into buffoons of time. They attack the lost adventurers with the huge wall clock, which was used to keep time at the Clocktower. Every time the Deep Buffoons shake the wall clock, the time is penetrated and fractured.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Enchanted

A mechanical apparatus built to restrict the trespassers entering an area limited to only the lab affiliates. This robot, resembling a huge box, floats around the lab to inspect people inside to keep intruders out of the lab. It will attack as soon as it detects a suspect, hence, must be controlled using the necessary console.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Enchanted

D in D. Roy does not stand for Doctor, but rather a name given to the modified version of a pre-existing mechanical apparatus. Since building the Neo Huroid, the alchemists of Alcadno have built an improved Roid which self-charges. It is more independently operated as alchemists had wished, but now they seem to be struggling with a new problem; the D. Roy is hard to control, which makes its maintenance and repair that much more difficult.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 73
Form : Enchanted

It is neither a mammal nor a plant. These strange forms of life co-exist although they are completely independent of each other, unlike the relationship that a crocodile and a plover bird share. Researchers seemed to have created these mysterious creatures to study a co-independent couple of organism that are of one entity.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 73
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

Creature living on the Stairway to the Sky, Lucida seems to resemble a black-furred devil. At first glance, it may look a lot like monsters made of Sanctity Attributes, such as Cellion, Lioner and Grupin, but Lucida is apparently a strong opponent against Poison Attacks, although it is vulnerable to Sanctity Attacks. Lucida seems so evil, going within a certain distance around Lucida seems to create sensations of evil right away, so be careful not to go hunting for Lucida without being amply prepared! It is a wonder if Lucida has always been so evil, though...

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 72
Form : Mammal

A monster born in an ocean of lava in a cave. With its reddish eyes, monstrous teeth, and spiky collar, Cerebes threatens its enemies although it only uses melee attacks. When Cerebes evolves into Bain, however, it will use powerful attacks of fire attribute, so beware.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 72
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A big beetle that lives in Minar Forest, where trees and leaves are abundant. It is protected by a thick outer layer that minimizes the external impact, and the sizable horn it sports on its head can to toss any threatening enemy far away.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 76
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A big beetle that lives in Minar Forest which acquired a steel-like firm, silver outer layer when it underwent ecdysis. It threatens its enemies with even more powerful attack than a regular Beetle.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 78
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A group of spirits that live in Minar Forest. Unlike their rugged appearance, their personality is rather bubbly and cheerful. They have the ability to out-jump a human by about 1.5 times, which allows them to distract the adventurers by bouncing around. Although they are said to have different colored eye on each side, it is hard to tell by their tiny pupils. They cannot carry a tune even if their lives depended on it, so when you hear Hankie screaming, you will undergo a temporary stun status.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as the Soul Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack. The original form of the teddy has been consumed and distorted by the force, leaving only the creature that controls the teddy as its only recognizable physical feature.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A fish monster that lived in the deep waters of Aqua Road. It used to fear just about everything, which explains its notable tendency to hide in its comfort zone. However, since the weakening of the purifying force of Aqua Road, even the young gobies have turned violent. A school of quick and tiny Gobies will attack any intruders who wreck their habitat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A monster that guards the Sanctuary in the Sleepywood Dungeon, located in central Victoria Island. It is a warrior that has the head of an ox and the body of a human, and uses a crescent-shaped spear to generate a lightning to destroy everything nearby. It dashes towards its enemy at a high speed with its lethal lightning attack, so you should never hastily approach this monster. It blocks the naive travellers from entering the cursed Sanctuary. It is said that Tauromacis serves as an usher to the Sanctuary to pay for its past crime. However it remains unknown what crime it committed and from whom the punishment is coming from.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A monster that guards the Sanctuary in the Sleepywood Dungeon, located in central Victoria Island. It dashes towards the adventurers with a huge spear, and has extremely high defense and attack rate. Furthermore, it moves at a impressively high speed, which renders this monster a bigger challenge than the Jr. Balrog to some adventurers. It guards the entrance of the cursed Sanctuary to prevent adventurers from entering. Although there is a rumor that it became the gate keeper as a punishment for a crime it has committed, but no one knows what the crime was or by whom this monster is being punished.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 78
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

An odd couple found in the snowfield far from El Nath. Even a serious adventurer would find Yeti and Pepe strange yet hilarious, as they nonchalantly roam the snowfield. Many researchers have sought to discover the origination of this phenomenon for a number of years, but no one has found any evidential basis that can support this anomaly. In any case, the phrase ‘as close as Yeti and Pepe' was coined based on what people have witnessed.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 73
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks.

The skeleton of a Sharenian commander which was brought to life by Ergoth's force of darkness. After the fall of the Sharenian empire, the skeleton of the commander was revived, devoid of its soul.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil

An unidentifiable monster who serves Lord Pirate. It is one rank superior to Kru, and contributes to pillaging the humans while sailing the sea. Now, it spends most of its energy pestering the Bellflower Roots under the command of Lord Pirate.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 75
Form : Mammal

A monster that appears in the form of a wolf in the very deep end of the valley in the snowfield. It walks on two feet like a human, but attacks with sharp claws that remain hidden until provoked. There is a rumor that a person who gets bitten by this monster turns into a Werewolf.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 89
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage. -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A teddy bear that was brought to life by the commands of cursed spirits during the Dimensional Schism. Said curse has consumed the coziness and warmth this teddy bear once possessed, only leaving an eternal grudge against humans which serves as the Soul Teddy's source of hatred and subsequent attack. The Master Teddy, having lost most of its physical characteristics of a teddy bear, exudes evil aura. The chain around the teddy that has turned gold, signifies that the teddy has lost all of its original traits and become a stray of time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A King Goblin known to fear just about everything including loud noise. It has even lost its goblin bat when the cracking noise of a hazelnut scared it to death. Although a coward, it can burn everything in flames using its big goblin bat. It likes pork.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage.

A King Goblin known for its amnesia that results in forgetting and losing just about everything. It has even lost its hat. Although a forgetful goblin, it can when the cracking noise of a hazelnut scared it to death. Although a coward, it can freeze everything near by using its big goblin bat. It likes rice wine.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks.

King Goblin known for its penchant for wrestling. It frequently pleads with the passersby for a wrestling match. It can fumigate everything nearby with its infamous flatulence. It likes buckwheat jelly.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A fuzzy spirit that lives only in Minar Forest. It cannot be found elsewhere, as it only lives in an area where no signs of contamination can be seen. Many adventurers are fooled by its fuzzy fur and adorable appearance, but it is covered in dust which has anesthetic effects.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 74
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A fuzzy spirit that lives only in Minar Forest. Unlike Rash, the creature from which the Dark Rash has evolved, it can be found in contaminated areas as well. The Dark Rash is even more harmful and dangerous than the regular Rash, as its body is covered in dust that has damning effects.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 72
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A dwarf spirit that lives in Minar Forest. It has an ugly face but even an uglier personality, so you must be cautious when approaching this monster. It steals from people, but cannot figure out how or for what the belongings are used. It is always in raggedy clothes, and an unconfirmed rumor has it that Hobi was banished from the town after committing a crime that turned this monster into a useless, heinous creature. Once a Halfling, the Hobis are not particularly fond of the Halflings.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 76
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A dwarf spirit that lives in Minar Forest. As the lead warrior of the Hobis, the Green Hobi is in a more fashionable attire, though not by much. Although it displays battle prowess, handling objects isn't a forte for this monster, much like a regular Hobi. The Halflings despise this monster, for it likes to attack their town and steal whatever it can get its hands on.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 83
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Ghost Pirate is one of them. The Ghost Pirate rides a flying boat that has a huge clock, allowing this monster to find its ways even through the Temporal Schism and pillage the lost adventurers. It is said that the Ghost Pirate is highly resistant to attacks of coldness attribute although it is terrified of fire attacks, for fire could easily burn its ship in flames.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 87
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Duel Ghost Pirate is one of them. The Duel Ghost Pirate rides a flying boat that has a huge clock, allowing this monster to find its ways even through the Temporal Schism and pillage the lost adventurers. As one of the most powerful pirate monster, its ship has a powerful propeller that can penetrate the gap in time. Although highly resistant against attacks of coldness attribute, it fears fire, for fire can burn its ship in flames.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 71
Form : Mammal

An apprentice of Mu Lung who had once trained to become a virtuous master, until it harmed a lot of people under the magic spell of the Priest Cat. It has, since then, chosen the path of penance, although it still occasionally harms people due to the lingering spell. Its physique of a trainee and its magic render this monster a difficult enemy to defeat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Mammal

A Three-Tailed Fox that transformed into a Nine-Tailed-Fox through an extensive training of magic. Its fur is silverish, bluish moon-like color, and this fox monster can be found in the Fox Ridge of Black Mountain, waiting to prey on the lives in Korean Folk Town. It has sharp claws, powerful magic skills, and Three-Tailed-Foxes that serve as subordinates that render this monster a challenging enemy to defeat, but the most dangerous quality of this monster comes from its cunningness that can easily deceive people. It likes to seduce people by disguising as a human, so be cautious when you come across an attractive lady at the foot of the Black Mountain.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 77
Form : Mammal

A wicked monster that lives in the Goblin Forest. It was a cat before it secretly mastered the magic that Mu Lung's trainees were studying in order to become virtuous masters. It considers Mu Lung's swordsmith, who instructs mental training, as its arch-nemesis. It dazzles the humans with its eloquence while riding a giant cloud, but remember that this Priest Cat is but a goblin inside.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Enchanted

The most unique invention built by the alchemists of Alcadno. At first, the alchemists tried to build a robot more powerful than Roid, but the result of their attempt, Deet, did not have the level of intelligence they had hoped for. Consequently, the alchemists combined Deet and Roid to create the product of best of both worlds. However, with Roid's intelligence and Deet's physical strength combined, this newly improved robot refused to obey the commands of the Alcadno alchemists, causing unforeseen ruckus. After debating what to do with this robot, they decided to play a prank on the Zenumist alchemists. Upon sneaking in this failed invention into the Zenumist lab, Deet and Roi began breaking all the beakers and flasks, leaving no choice for the Zenumist alchemists but to destroy the robot using their renowned magic skills. However, the only way to completely destroy Deet and Roi is to break it into pieces, as even activating the most effective machine in lab 202 could only inflict rusting.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Enchanted

A strange form of life created in a beaker, which has eventually become independently mobile. It was intended to be a project of creating a life form mainly consisting of soil based on the force of nature, but an accidental drop of blood resulted in this mysterious, unidentifiable creature. It began its life as one creature before undergoing a biological variation that has bifurcated this monster into two separate creatures.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

An ancient evil spirit which possesses huge wings and sharp claws. It can be found in the Cursed Sanctuary located deep inside the Sleepywood Dungeon in central Victoria Island. It still remains unknown as to how the Jr. Balrog was released inside the dungeon, but it is no mystery that the Jr. Balrog has high attack rate as well as powerful magic skill that will well exceed your expectation, especially its lethal magic attack called Meteo Magic during which the Balrog drops meteorites it has summoned. It is the most challenging monster to defeat in Victoria Island.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A monster that appears in the form of a giant wolf, occasionally found deep inside the valley of the snowfield. It walks on two feet like a human, and attacks with its sharp claws. Furthermore, it has high defense rate against physical and magic attacks, not to mention its ability to summon Werewolves when it finds itself at a disadvantageous situation. It is resistant against cold air but vulnerable to fire, so it would be wise to attack with fire attribute when hunting Lycanthrope.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Bird
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A bird-like monster with a long tail. It has a ravishing blue tail and a lovely voice that complements its beauty; however, it seduces people in order to lower their Accuracy, putting them in danger.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 83
Form : Bird
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A bird-like monster with a long tail. It has a ravishing reddish tail and a lovely voice that complements its beauty; however, it seduces people in order to lower their Accuracy, putting them in danger.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 82
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

An odd couple found in the snowfield far from El Nath. The blackened Yeti and Pepe who have been consumed by the force of evil boast more power in terms of attack, defense, and speed in comparison to that of regular Yeti and Pepe.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A spirit that has the torso of a human and the lower body of a horse. It wears a helmet that has horns sticking out on each side, resembling a Trojan warrior on a horse. It belongs to a group of warriors that have fought against each other for a long time just to prove their strength. It possesses the power of fire attribute and fears attacks of coldness attribute. The Black Kentaurus has the force of darkness, which explains its fear of attacks of sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A spirit that has the torso of a human and the lower body of a horse. It wears a helmet that has horns sticking out on each side, resembling a Trojan warrior on a horse. It belongs to a group of warriors that have fought against each other for a long time just to prove their strength. It possesses the power of fire attribute and fears attacks of coldness attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A spirit with a human torso and the lower body of a horse. Wears a helmet with a blue tassel and carries a spear in its hand which makes it look like a knight and its stead. As a warrior group that pursues strength, humans have apparently been at war with these Kentauruses for as long as one could remember. This spirit also has ice powers and is therefore vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster that has big coiled horns which closely resemble those of a sheep. However, it has a black tail and a small pair of black wings, though no one has seen it fly. While it chews on grass and remains carefree, it becomes furious when attacked, persistently chasing after the enemy. Although it looks like a mammal, some speculate that it is a species of its own.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 88
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Sanctity Attribute Damage. -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A monster that resembles a sheep with huge horns. Contrary to its physical appearance, it has a pair of small reddish wings and a reddish tail. Some claim that it is of the same family as Lucida for said reasons, but such claim has not been confirmed. Something about this monster makes one question whether it really is just an animal monster.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

The confusion in time as a result of the Temporal Schism has affected the clocks in Ludibrium. The Klock became a monster when an evil force consumed its spirit during the Temporal Schism.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 76
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

The confusion in time as a result of the Temporal Schism has affected the clocks in Ludibrium. The Klock became a monster when an evil force consumed its spirit during the Temporal Schism. This monster is an evolved form of Klock, which has acquired even strong force of darkness.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A monster born in an ocean of lava in a cave. It was originally a bulldog before completely absorbing the mysterious force in lava, evolving into its current monstrous state. It has fire attribute and, as the ruler of the lava, it attacks by emitting flame of blazing heat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 92
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A fish monster found in the deep waters of Aqua Road. Nothing but its skeleton is left, which makes it hard to determine what kind of fish it was before transforming into a monster. It threatens the adventurers with its freaky skeletal appearance and easily noticeable sharp teeth. People suspect that this monster was created during the weakening of the purifying force of Aqua Road.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. While it belongs to the family of dragons, it falls under the category of lower ranking dragons despite its hard shell that render this monster formidable. It is quick to bow down to anyone of superior power, which explains its role as the loyal servant to Horntail. It is a monster of ice attribute; hence, it is vulnerable to attacks of fire attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 93
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. While it belongs to the family of dragons, it falls under the category of lower ranking dragons despite its hard shell that render this monster formidable. It is quick to bow down to anyone of superior power, which explains its role as the loyal servant to Horntail. It is a monster of fire attribute; hence, it is vulnerable to attacks of ice attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. It is considered one of the stronger dragons, but has relatively low intelligence; hence, it is controlled by an unidentifiable creature that hides inside the egg, which many people have suspected to be Horntail. Compared to its well-developed hind legs, its front legs are pitifully weak.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 97
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A dragon monster that can be found in the Dragon Forest. It is considered one of the stronger dragons, but has relatively low intelligence; hence, it is controlled by an unidentifiable creature that hides inside the egg, which many people have suspected to be Horntail. It has frightening horns and is more ferocious than Rexton.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 93
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Electricity Attribute Attacks.

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Spirit Viking is one of them. The Spirit Viking has reached the Clocktower while wandering in the lost time, and wishes to go back to the world from which it came. It attacks people, believing that they are the ones responsible for the confusion which the Temporal Schism has created.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 98
Form : Devil

There are particular entities that linger the infinitude of the space-time continuum, where no ordinary creature can reach by ordinary means; Gigantic Spirit Viking is one of them. The Spirit Viking has reached the Clocktower while wandering in the lost time, and wishes to go back to the world from which it came. It wears a flag on its back to find its lost family and attacks any person it encounters, believing that people are responsible for the confusion which the Temporal Schism has created.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 94
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A monster that appears in the form of a squid near the gorge deep in the waters of Aqua Road. They were believed to be extinct due to the function of purifying force in Aqua Road, but they have reappeared as the said force weakened. They attack by squirting poisonous ink, that can leave its enemy in the state of addiction.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 95
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Ice Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A long time ago, the king of Ludibrium punished the sinners of heinous crimes by locking them inside a clock, forcing them to reflect on their sins for eternity. However, the evil spirits that were locked inside the clocks were awoken during the Temporal Schism. Although said evil spirits are still imprisoned in the clock, their escape is becoming more and more plausible, not to mention that Phanom Watch has begun to attack those who are trying to change the dimensions, floating around in the air with a huge clock on its back.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 97
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A monster that appears in the form of a squid near the gorge deep in the waters of Aqua Road. They were believed to be extinct due to the function of purifying force in Aqua Road, but they have reappeared as the said force weakened. It can charge electricity using its two ocelli, attacking its enemies with electricity attribute. If attacked by its electricity attack, your body will stiffen due to the shock.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 99
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks. Ice Attribute Attacks Cancelled.

A long time ago, the king of Ludibrium punished the sinners of heinous crimes by locking them inside a clock, forcing them to reflect on their sins for eternity. However, the evil spirits that were locked inside the clocks were awoken during the Temporal Schism, and rather than seeking forgiveness and redemption, the evil spirits grew even more vengeful against Ludibrium. Although said evil spirits are still imprisoned in the clock, their escape is becoming more and more plausible, not to mention that Grim Phantom Watch has already begun to freely attack the adventurers.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Resistant to Poison Attribute Attacks. Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A monster that attacks the ship of adventurers near the continent of Ossyria. It looks similar to the Jr. Balrogs that are found near Victoria Island, but the Crimson Balrogs fly using their huge wings. Some say that the habitat of Crimson Balrogs is an island like Orbis, but such claim has not been confirmed. Due to its force of attack and magic skills that will surpass your expectation, it is suggested that you evade to a safe area rather than hastily attack back should you find yourself in the midst of their attack. They are vulnerable to sanctity attribute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage.

A shark found in the deep waters of Aqua Road. The Shark turned even more ferocious as the purifying force of Aqua Road weakened. It attacks with its sharp teeth that can inflict deadly injuries, and some daring adventurers hunt these Sharks to collect their teeth as a trophy.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 102
Form : Fish
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. -50% Ice Attribute Damage.

A shark found in the deep waters of Aqua Road. The Shark turned even more ferocious as the purifying force of Aqua Road weakened. It has a sharp saw-like protrusion near its mouth, and attacks with its sharp teeth that can inflict deadly injuries. Although its dorsal fin is said to make an exquisite dish, no adventurers other than those with exceptional courage and drive would have what it takes to hunt a Cold Shark.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It is of the middle rank in the family of dragons, and its notable traits include high intelligence level and useful limbs that can freely move. With its threatening horn and soft skin, as well as long legs, this monster is physically strong; however, its flexibility and adaptability in using human tools to attack is one of the unique characteristics that render this monster a formidable enemy to defeat. People claim that the family of Green Cornians are the closest to humans.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It is of the middle rank in the family of dragons, and its notable traits include high intelligence level and useful limbs that can freely move. With its threatening horn and soft skin, as well as long legs, this monster is physically strong; however, its flexibility and adaptability in using human tools to attack is one of the unique characteristics that render this monster a formidable enemy to defeat. It is considered the warriors of Cornians.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 97
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It has a huge pair of reddish wings but no front legs. It sets its nest in between the valleys, and has a decent level of intelligence as well as an extremely fast speed, not to mention the wind it can create with its huge wings. It also orally emits flames.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 101
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : Vulnerable Fire Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage.

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It has a huge pair of blue wings but no front legs. It sets its nest in between the valleys, and has a decent level of intelligence as well as an extremely fast speed, not to mention the wind it can create with its huge wings. It also orally emits cold air.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 103
Form : Reptile

A ferocious dragon that lives in the Dragon Canyon. It has a huge pair of black wings but no front legs. It sets its nest in between the valleys, and has a decent level of intelligence and orally emits the breath of damnation.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 108
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage.

A powerful gate guard that Papulatus summoned to prevent any form of intrusion into the operation room of the Clocktower. It will make everyone and everything shiver in fear should anyone try to step into the warped corridor of the Clocktower.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 108
Form : Devil
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks. -50% Ice Attribute Damage.

A creature of an alternate dimension that Papulatus summoned to prevent any form of intrusion into the operation room of the Clocktower. It is a wizard of another dimension linked to the Dimensional Schism which attacks intruders using its magic skills.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Reptile
Special Trait : -50% Fire Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Ice Attribute Attacks.

An evil monster of the dragon family that lives in Manon's Forest. It is considered a high-ranking dragon, boasting various magic skills as well as high level of intelligence. Its physical strength also contributes to the challenge for adventurers battling against this monster, as it is covered by a firm outer layer and has a breath that can melt even the toughest metals. It can also fly using its small wings. The Manons had an amicable relationship with the Halflings, but for an unknown reason, they have become hostile towards one another.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. Vulnerable to Poison Attribute Attacks.

A strange race of creatures that live in Griffey Forest. They have a body of a unicorn, eagle's wings, and the tail of a lion. They rival the strength of the dignified dragons, and they have set their nests in Leafre, which is considered to be the land of the dragons. As a race of high intelligence level and respect, the Griffeys, according to a legend, are said to be loyal to heroes.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 105
Form : Reptile

A group of young dragons that live in the nest. Ever since their amicable relationship with the Halflings came to an end, they have been left unattended without the protection that Halflings once supplied. The Jr. Newties cannot leave their nests, but they have the power to attack using a sound wave at a distance. When the Jr. Newties are attacked, a messenger of the nest that protect the Jr. Newties appears.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110
Form : Enchanted

A golem that guards the nest of a dragon. It has made a deal with the evil dragons to guard their eggs. This monster carries around the nest on top of its head to protect the Jr. Newtie. It is summoned when Jr. Newtie dies.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 110
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A group of skeletons that belong to the dragon family. The Skelegons can be found roaming around the dragon nests, unaware that they have died and have become Undeads. They are the reincarnation of dead dragons who were killed during the Dragon War, and will attack anything that comes near regardless of whether the approaching enemy is a human, a dragon, or any other forms of life.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 113
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Sanctity Attribute Attacks.

A group of skeletons that belong to the dragon family. The Skelegons can be found roaming around the dragon nests, unaware that they have died and have become Undeads. They are the reincarnation of dead dragons who were killed during the Dragon War, and will attack anything that comes near regardless of whether the approaching enemy is a human, a dragon, or any other forms of life. Looking at the cane that they hold in one hand, they are suspected to have been a group of old veteran dragons.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.80
Form : Inorganic

It is an hourglass that was lost by a traveler who was traveling through Time Lane. It doesn't work because it's cracked, but it is said to have gained the power to awake an unknown being from being left inside the temple for so long. When it meets a temple visitor, it follows them around thinking they might be its owner. Because its power comes from the temple itself, it turns into a regular hourglass if you take it outside the temple.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.91
Form : Spirit

The Memory Monks stand at Memory Lane beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. They wear a smiley mask that hints at nothing but happy memories, but no one really knows what they are feeling beneath those masks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.94
Form : Spirit

The Memory Monks stand at Memory Lane beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. They wear a smiley mask that hints at nothing but happy memories, but no one really knows what they are feeling beneath those masks.
They are a level above monk trainees and often have a trainee following them on each side. Monk trainees have gray masks because they are not skilled enough to wear the smiley mask.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.98
Form : Spirit

The chief of the Memory Guardians stands at Memory Lane, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Compared to other guardians, its armor seems more sturdy and brilliantly decorated. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the goddess inside the temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the goddess. The only evidence left that it was once human is its heart that contains beautiful memories.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.101
Form : Spirit

The chief of the Memory Guardians stands at Memory Lane, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Compared to other guardians, its armor seems more sturdy and brilliantly decorated. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the goddess inside the temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the goddess. The only evidence left that it was once human is its heart that contains beautiful memories.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.106
Form : Spirit

The Qualm Monks stand at the Road of Regrets, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. In order to never have any regrets, they wear a neutral mask to restrain all emotions. However, no one knows what they are really feeling beneath those masks.

The Qualm Monks stand at the Road of Regrets, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. In order to never have any regrets, they wear a neutral mask to restrain all emotions. However, no one knows what they are really feeling beneath those masks. 
They are a level above monk trainees and often have a trainee following them on each side. Monk trainees have gray masks because they are not skilled enough to wear the neutral mask.

Level : Lv.113
Form : Spirit

The chief of the Qualm Guardians stands at the Road of Regrets, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Compared to other guardians, its armor seems more sturdy and brilliantly decorated. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the goddess inside the temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the goddess. The only evidence left of its lost humanity is its hardened heart that contains all its bitter memories.

It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the goddess inside the temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the goddess. The only evidence left of its lost humanity is its hardened heart that contains all its bitter memories.

string.value:
Level : Lv.121
Form : Spirit

The Oblivion Monks stand at the Road to Oblivion. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Because they have lost all of thier memories of the past, they wear a frowny mask. However, no one knows if the monks are even aware they have forgotten their past nor if they experience sadness because of it.

string.value:
Level : Lv.124

The Oblivion Monks stand at the Road to Oblivion. They serve Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Because they have lost all of thier memories of the past, they wear a frowny mask. However, no one knows if the monks are even aware they have forgotten their past nor if they experience sadness because of it.
They are a level above monk trainees and often have a trainee following them on each side. Monk trainees have gray masks because they are not skilled enough to wear the frowny mask.

The chief of the Oblivion Guardians stands at the Road to Oblivion, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the goddess inside the temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the goddess. The only evidence left of its lost humanity is its shriveled heart that remains as an empty shell of lost memories.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.131
Form : Spirit

The chief of the Oblivion Guardians stands at the Road to Oblivion, beyond the Gate of the Past, inside the Temple of Time. Its sole purpose is to protect Rhinne, the Goddess of Time. Compared to other guardians, its armor seems more sturdy and brilliantly decorated. It once was a human knight, but throughout the many years of protecting the goddess inside the temple, it has cast off its humanness. Now it only exists to serve the goddess. The only evidence left of its lost humanity is its shriveled heart that remains as an empty shell of lost memories.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 83
Form : Mammal

An ancient creature that's been dormant for a long period of time. They say that Elliza used to be the beloved pet of a Goddess who ruled over Orbis. Unfortunately, the Pixies kidnapped the Goddess while Elliza was asleep, taking over Elliza's nesting place. The angry Elliza exploded in furor and created numerous doppelgangers as an expression of its rage. When Elliza is calm, it can actually be a pretty interesting conversationalist. Elliza enjoys listening to music, which often puts this creature to sleep.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 90
Form : Mammal

According to legend, this Snowman was born between a human and a Snow Spirit. It has the soul of a human but was born with the appearance of a monster which caused him much grief growing up as he was constantly taunted by other humans. The Snow Spirit, who watched Snowman's sad situation, froze up an entire mountain range for Snowman and called it El Nath. Snowman doesn't like humans and hence stays away from them as much as possible, but he'd never attack a human first on his own. However, it will mercilessly attack anyone who breaks the Fragment of the Snow Spirit.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 85
Form : Enchanted

An unknown creature sometimes known as the Alchemist's experiment-gone-wrong and sometimes known as the strange genius Yulete's experimental creation. This strange creature, which is neither animal nor Roid, is often spotted around secret passageways that are only known by some. Some say that it was created in the secret laboratory hidden in such a secret passageway, and there are rumors that claim that someone had left Kimera there for a specific purpose. So far, none of the rumors surrounding Kimera have been unconfirmed.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 120
Form : Reptile

Master of the Dragon Canyon, the Leviathan is the loyal servant of the Horntail. Born from a glowing silver egg, it has grown to become the protector and ruler of the Wyverns in the Canyon. Leviathan attacks travellers that approach the Cave of Life while silently hovering over the canyon skies, flying around with its silky smooth snake-like skin and wings. It is a much-feared creature in the canyon.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.121
Form : Fish

A very rare giant whale that only lives inside the Temple of Time. With its thick fins, it swims through air instead of the water, eating pieces of memory that float around. It is said that it only eats happy memories so it is always in a good mood. It often gives the Temple Keepr a headache because it even eats the memories of those visiting the Temple of Time, but because it is an endangered species, there's nothing he can do about it.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.131
Form : Spirit

They say he was a well known and respected human knight in the past. He couldn't find a lord he wanted to serve so he decided to offer his services to Goddess Rhinne and live his life outside of the flow of time. As he was positioned to guard the Road of Regrets, he hardened his heart to protect it from having any regrets. He eventually lost his humanness and became the Ice Knight. He is known to be too strict and too serious, even attacking approved visitors, saying that they will disturb the Goddess' sleep. He doesn't get along with the Temple Keeper because of that.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.141
Form : Animal

A prisoner of the Temple of Time who was locked up after committing an atrocious crime. It should've received a much more severe punishment for what it did; however, Goddess Rhinne was considerate of the fact that Lyka was born evil and that it would be unfair for it to bear all of the responsibility. So instead, Rhinne decided to lock it up inside the Road to Oblivion so that the flame of oblivion can burn away its evil heart... However, even after all these years, Lyka's vile nature still remains, making the Temple Keeper tremble in fear.

string.name: episode
string.value:
레벨 : Lv.90
형태 : 식물형

바깥보다는 집을 좋아하는 머쉬맘의 특성 때문일까? 머쉬맘의 변종인 블루 머쉬맘도 자신이 머무를 집을 찾았다. 그런데 집은 집인데 아무래도 주소를 잘못찾은 듯! 아랫마을 도깨비집에 난데없이 나타난 블루 머쉬맘 때문에 도깨비들이 곤욕을 치르고 있다. 갑자기 튀어나와서 왕도깨비들을 깜짝 놀라키고 있는 블루 머쉬맘은 왕도깨비들의 불만스러운 잔소리에도 아랑곳하지 않는다. 다 쓰러져가는 도깨비집이 무척이나 마음에 드는 듯 하다.

string.name: episode
string.value:
레벨 : Lv.85
형태 : 무기물형

빅토리아중앙던전의 개미굴광장에는 유명한 노점상인이 있다. 하지만 그 보다 더 깊은 던전에 가끔씩 정체불명의 포장마차가 문을 연다는데... 더 특이한 점은 이 포장마차에서 물건을 사 본 사람은 아직 한 명도 없다는 것이다. 그 이유는 가까이 다가가기만 하면 갑자기 태도가 180도 달라지기 때문이라는데... 개미굴 광장의 노점상인은 경쟁자의 출현에 심기가 불편한것 같다.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : Unknown
Form : Enchanted

A monster from another world which landed here as a result of the Dimensional Schism. It may have numerous personalities, but all of those personalities are uniformly evil, having contributed to the progression of the Dimensional Schism with the force of Ludibrium, not to mention how it's turned all the toys of Ludibrium into monsters. They say that Papulatus is increasingly endowed with more and more power from the forces of the other world as the Dimensional Schism grows larger and larger over time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : Unknown
Form : Fish
Special Trait : Vulnerable to Fire Attribute Attacks.

A ferocious fish monster that lives in the cave under the ocean. It sticks its head out from a tiny hole in the cave, which is why its size remains a mystery. Some suspect that this monster has not fully come out of the cave because it's stuck, but no evidences support such a rumor. Although it does not move, it is the king of the deep sea that attacks by shooting a laser beam out of its mouth.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 9
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster with an orange cap with white spots much like that of the Orange Mushroom monster. However, this monster has a strangely cynical and suspicious expression on its face which renders it hardly approachable. There are apparently a lot of these mushroom monsters expanding their habitat throughout the forest of east Henesys.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : Unknown
Form : Reptile

The first dragon that's ever stood up against the dragon chief, Nine Spirit, who was the former ruler over Minar Forest. Horntail assembled an army of evil dragons to create an evil force that instigated the historically-known Dragon War. Horntail seemed to be the more powerful one at the beginning, but Nine Spirit's longstanding experience and wisdom as a leader seemed to overpower Horntail's inexperience. In the end, Horntail broke the Pact between the dragons and Halflings and attacked the Halflings' village, stealing the egg of Nine Spirit which they were protecting. This was a crime that no dragon known as the guardian of order should have committed. Ultimately, Horntail overthrew the reign of Nine Spirit, and the forest was conquered by the demonic servants of Horntail. Since then, no traces of true, honorable dragons could be found in the forest. Horntail, who has three heads and, subsequently, three different minds, is currently hiding in a cave to heal his wounds, and plotting to rule the regions even past Leafre using the egg of Nine Spirit.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.180
Form : Spirit

A monster that has been summoned by a mysterious man named Kirston using the Mirror of the Goddess. It doesn't seem that Kirston intentionally summoned Pink Bean. Although Pink Bean is a cute little creature, its power is beyond imagination. It is a very dangerous monster and should be approached with caution. One of its amazing powers is that it can revive a dead god. It seems to be a monster from another world.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 40
Form : Spirit

It is a mutated slime which once was a regular slime before transforming into a King Slime due to the three sisters that were experimenting with magic. Though it looks like a regular slime of jelly-like substance, it can probably turn the world upside down with its gigantic, heavy body. The three sisters are busy recruiting adventurers who can defeat this King Slime.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 56
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

A peculiar creature that swims the vast sea with its gigantic body. It is a monster that threatens the adventurers lost in the dimensional imbalance, although it, too, is a victim of the Dimensional Schism. It is a creature of powerful strength as well as an invincible monster that cannot be completely destroyed but only chased away.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : Unknown
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

Sharen III, the ruler of the great empire that once existed in the highlands known as Sharenian, called out this evil spirit to guard the legendary jewel, Rubian. Ergoth, whom Sharen III revived, betrayed Sharen III by using the power of Rubian to destroy Sharenian and building his own empire on top of the remains. After a long time passed, the ruins of Sharenian was discovered, and the people who went inside to explore laid their hands on Rubian; this awakened Ergoth, who had been asleep for a long time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 74
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

The king of all pixies. Before relocating to Orbis, they had an island of their own which eventually sank underwater when the island could no longer support the weight of the increasing number of pixies. As an experienced pixie who's had an extensive training in magic, the Papa Pixie can cast powerful magic that will surpass your expectation. Some say his long mustache is the source of his power.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 70
Form : Devil
Special Trait : -50% Damage of All Attributes.

A longtime pirate captain who's dominated the oceans of Ossyria over a long period of time. Known for its uncontested domination of the Ossyria oceans, Lord Pirate has taunted numerous people and has collected countless loads of treasures over the years, but ended up in stormy waters after following a map that was discovered in some desert island. Lord Pirate has been injured since then and has been stuck near Herb Town. Despite the injury, Lord Pirate lost nothing of its vicious character. In fact, it has been using Herb Town as its strategic base to invade the nearby Kingdom of Bellflower, holding them captive as slaves. Guon, an old yet loyal subject, is currently recruiting adventurers to rescue the prince Bellflower Root, Wu Yang.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 81
Form : Enchanted
Special Trait : -50% Electricity Attribute Damage. -50% Poison Attribute Damage.

A most powerful Roid created by combining Zenumist magic and Alcadno technology, the Frankenroid is made of steel limbs and a body that carries all sorts of weapons inside, not to mention a brain that is equivalent in intelligence to that of a human. This exquisite machinery was created by an alchemist, whose name, however, shall remain unknown.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv.: 80
Form : Enchanted

A mysterious man once took over the east region of Ellin Forest in order to conduct a questionable research in poison, and created these golems after destroying the forest. The Poison Golems are made of stone and, as defined in their name, are poisonous due to the layer of moss that covers their outer surface; it is also rumored that they can use magic. No one knows what purpose the mysterious man had in creating such creatures.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 150
Form : Enchanted

Sensei of the well famed warrior-House of Mu Lung. Although he is old, his martial-arts techniques still pounds with fervor. Surely not an opponent to be taken lightly.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 47
Form : Enchanted

A Mithril being created by alchemy means... It's constitution, made purely by Mithril, makes it a tough opponent.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 9
Form : Plant

A mushroom monster with an orange cap and white spots much like the Orange Mushroom, only with a cynical expression on its face. Somehow, it has a suspicious look about it. There are apparently a lot of these mushrooms spreading through the forests of east Henesys...

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : Unknown
Form : Spirit
Special Trait : Only appears in Happyville.

A snowman that came to life due to the force of magic. This snowman, made by innocent kids, used to live in Happyville, until it could no longer suppress its curiosity and eventually ended up in Maple World to freely explore without any agenda. Contrary to its intentions to get close to humans and befriend them, the Kid Snowman inadvertently caused trouble around town, breaking things. 
Frightened at this gigantic snowman, people tried to drive the snowman out of their town, and the snowman, hurt and upset, began to go around wrecking everything it could get its hands on. However, in the end, the snowman sprinkled white snowflakes, presenting the townspeople with their first snow before returning home. It will be back someday, as long as innocence and purity remain in Maple World.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : Unknown
Form : Mammal
Special Trait : Looks just like a reindeer.

Santa Cliff's once adored and loved pet. This Rudolf that used to live with Santa Cliff in Happyville came out for a walk on its own and lost its way back home. Some has claimed that this Rudolf has been seen around Maple World which sounds quite likely considering that it travels fast and tends to be curious about everything; however, it is nowhere to be found. Cliff is still clinging onto hope that his Rudolph will one day come back to his arms, but he hasn't had any luck.
Because it looks a lot like the reindeers that live in Mu Lung, there have been countless false notifications, claiming that Rudolph has been found. Remember to contact Cliff in Happyville if you happen to find the lost Rudolph; it has a big, round red nose so you'll know when you see it!

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.105
Form : Demon

The Prince of Darkness, who was sealed deep in the Victoria Central Dungeon by Manji and Tristan years and years ago. After he was sealed, people slowly forgot he even existed. But now, he is regaining his strength. He show signs of wanting to break the seal and revive once again.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.9
Type : Creature

A special monster that's only available on the ice island of Rien. Only a select few grown Muru grow to be like this. Has a horn on its head, and sports a relatively powerful attack for a Muru.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.7
Type : Creature

A special monster that's only available on the ice island of Rien. Noted for a Baby Muru on its head.=

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.5
Type : Creature

A special monster that's only available on the ice island of Rien. One of the grown Murus who may sport a suddenly-aged look, but is really but a teenager in Muru years.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.3
Type : Creature

A special monster that's only available on the ice island of Rien. One of the grown Murus featuring an unusually thick lips.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.1
Type : Creature

A special monster that's only available on the ice island of Rien. Covered in white fur, as if made out of snow. Looks like it may just melt away if under the direct sun.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.15
Type : Plants
Notes: Immune to poison-based attacks.

A mushroom monster featuring a dirty green cap, and has that sick look on its face as if it's about to throw up any minute.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.19
Type : Plants

A rare Stump that can only be found around relics. Features a unique face even for a Ghost Stump. Its ever-present smile makes one wonder whether it has a good day or not. Some scholars call it the smile that makes one punch its face. (String) (String)

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.24
Type : Immortal
Notes: Weak against holy attacks

A mushroom monster that was revived using the charm of a dead figure. These mushrooms feature a unique facial expression that makes them look like they are under much duress. (String)

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.30
Type : Plants

When King Pepe ambushed the Kingdom of Mushroom, these Spores turned their backs on King Mush and turned into an ally for King Pepe, preventing the explorers from approaching the Mushroom Castle.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.32
Type : Creature

Soldiers brought in by King Pepe. They may be young, but they are so eager to prove their courage that they roam around wearing helmets at least two sizes too big. They also suffer from migranes as a result.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.31
Type : Creature

Used to be a regular type of a pig, but it was raised near the Mushroom Castle. Constantly being poked by the spinal vine, the pig started growing bruises around its body, and is constantly under stress, so even a mild surprise will trigger a rage attack.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.30
Type : Plants

A tainted mushroom born out of poison from the spinal vine planted by King Pepe. Not lethal by any means, but it can cause one to fall asleep for a prolonged period of time.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.33
Type : Creature

A group of soldiers brought by King Pepe. They may look anything but cerebral, but they are quite adept at handling spears. One huge advantage being that they are cross-eyed, so they aren't very accurate with their attacks.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.35
Type : Creature

A combined form of Grey Yeti and King Pepe. Grey Yeti is the quietest of the three who knows how to defend itself.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.35
Type : Creature

A combined form of Gold Yeti and King Pepe. Gold Yeti is the smartest of the three Yetis, and the most loyal as well.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.35
Type : Creature

A combined form of White Yeti and King Pepe. Possesses the best form of magic powers out of the three.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Level : Lv.38
Type : Plants

Was the Prime Minister of Kingdom of Mumroom, but drove King Mush away and joined forces with King Pepe to take over the kingdom, creating massive chaos in the process. Showed his true colors when King Mush was thrown out into the forest.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 25
Form : Human
Special Trait : Weak against poison and fire-based attacks.

A Low-tier Ninja that has been diligently training at the Ninja Town. The skills may not be on par with the Ninjas of higher level, but their penchant for blades cannot be ignored.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 50
Form : Human
Special Trait : Weak against lightning-based and fire-based attacks.

A Mid-tier Ninja that worked himself up from Low-tier Ninja. An expert at threatening the masses with throwing stars. Watch out for a black, shadowy figure behind. your. back.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 80
Form : Human
Special Trait : Weak against holy attacks, but is unaffected against ice-based attacks.

A Mid-tier Ninja that worked himself all the way to the high-tier Ninja. Deeply injured at a training against an ice-based attack.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 100
Form : Human
Special Trait : Weak against holy attacks, little damage against lighting and fire-based attacks, and unaffected against poison-based attacks.

The head of the NInjas. Because of the past battles within the castle, he reached a number of life and death situations, and... no one can confirm whether he's really alive or not.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 30
Form : Human
Special Trait : Weak against lightning and poison-based attacks.

A soldier that believes that the emperor inside the castle is the real deal. Uses a spear that he's not accustomed to using.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 120
Form : Immortal
Special Trait : Weak against lightning, ice, and fire-based attacks, but unaffected against poison. 

A ninja that perished years ago at a chaotic battle in the confines of Ninja Castle, but has been floating around the castle as a ghost, unable to let go of the past.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 60
Form : Human
Special Trait : Weak against fire-based attacks, but unaffected against holy attacks. 

A female ninja that was trained at Ninja Town. Used to live the life of a regular girl until one day, her fiance got brutally murdered by a monster. She has dedicated her life to combat ever since. Her expertise is stealth observation, but ever since the Ninja Castle got sieged, she stopped hiding herself and started engaging in the combat.

string.name: episode
string.value:
Lv. : 180
Form : Human
Special Trait : Weak against poison-based attacks.

A toad monster that had extended its life for an unfathomably long time. Enticed the real emperor to go with him, and has been in control of the Ninja Castle since. Receive enough damage, and it'll show its true colors. No one has yet to spot the real emperor.
